Kevin Bacon.info: Kevin Bacon is an American actor and musician, widely recognized for his versatility and contributions to film and television. He was born on July 8, 1958, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. As of 2023, Kevin Bacon is 65 years old. He has had a prolific career, starring in iconic films such as "Footloose," "A Few Good Men," "Apollo 13," and "Mystic River." Besides his film career, he has also appeared in television series like "The Following." Kevin Bacon is known for his cultural phenomena, "The Six Degrees of Kevin Bacon," which highlights his extensive connectivity in Hollywood.

Kyra Sedgwick.info: Kyra Sedgwick is an American actress and producer known for her work in television and film. She was born on August 19, 1965, in New York City, New York, USA. As of now, she is 58 years old. Sedgwick is best known for her leading role as Deputy Chief Brenda Leigh Johnson on the TNT crime drama series "The Closer," which earned her a Golden Globe Award and an Emmy Award. Beyond "The Closer," Sedgwick has appeared in numerous films and TV shows, and she has also ventured into directing and producing projects. Her career has spanned several decades, showcasing her versatility and talent in the entertainment industry.

Laurence Fishburne.info:
Laurence Fishburne is an American actor and producer, famous for his versatile performances in film, television, and theater. He was born on July 30, 1961, in Augusta, Georgia, USA. As of 2023, Laurence Fishburne is 62 years old.

Fishburne's career spans several decades, and he is best known for his roles in films such as "The Matrix" trilogy, where he portrayed the iconic character Morpheus, and "Boyz n the Hood." He has also earned critical acclaim for his performances in television series, including his role as Dr. Raymond Langston on "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation" and as Nelson Mandela in the critically acclaimed HBO film "Mandela."

Throughout his career, Fishburne has been recognized with numerous awards and nominations, including an Emmy Award and a Tony Award. His contributions to the entertainment industry have made him one of the most respected and talented actors of his generation.

John Lithgow.info: John Lithgow is a versatile American actor, known for his work in film, television, and theater. He was born on October 19, 1945, in Rochester, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 77 years old. Lithgow has had an extensive career that includes notable roles in productions such as "Third Rock from the Sun," for which he won several Emmy Awards, and films like "The World According to Garp," "Terms of Endearment," and "Footloose." He is also recognized for his voice work and performances on Broadway.

John Belushi.info: John Belushi was an American comedian, actor, and musician best known for his work on "Saturday Night Live" and his roles in films like "Animal House" and "The Blues Brothers." He was born on January 24, 1949, in Chicago, Illinois. Sadly, John Belushi's life was cut short when he passed away at the age of 33 on March 5, 1982, in Los Angeles, California. Despite his short life, Belushi left a lasting impact on comedy and popular culture.

Tom Cruise.info: Tom Cruise, whose full name is Thomas Cruise Mapother IV, is an American actor and producer. He was born on July 3, 1962, in Syracuse, New York, USA. As of October 2023, Tom Cruise is 61 years old. Known for his charismatic screen presence and versatility, Cruise has become one of the most prominent figures in the entertainment industry. He gained widespread recognition for his roles in films such as "Top Gun," "Rain Man," "Jerry Maguire," and the "Mission: Impossible" series, among many others. Cruise's career spans several decades, and he has been lauded for both his dramatic and action roles.

Jennifer Aniston.info: Jennifer Aniston is an American actress, producer, and businesswoman. She was born on February 11, 1969, in Sherman Oaks, Los Angeles, California, USA. As of October 2023, she is 54 years old. Aniston gained worldwide recognition for her portrayal of Rachel Green on the television sitcom "Friends," which aired from 1994 to 2004. Her performance earned her multiple awards, including a Primetime Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Award. In addition to her television work, Aniston has also starred in a number of successful films such as "Marley & Me," "The Break-Up," "Horrible Bosses," and "We're the Millers." Beyond acting, she is also involved in film production and various philanthropic endeavors.

Paul Reiser.info: Paul Reiser is an American actor, comedian, and writer, known for his work in both television and film. He was born on March 30, 1956, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 67 years old. Reiser gained widespread recognition for his role in the hit television sitcom "Mad About You," where he starred alongside Helen Hunt. Throughout his career, he has appeared in a variety of roles, showcasing his versatility in both comedic and dramatic performances. In addition to acting, Reiser is also a successful stand-up comedian and has authored several books.

Kelsey Grammer.info: Kelsey Grammer is an American actor, comedian, producer, director, and writer best known for his role as Dr. Frasier Crane on the NBC sitcoms "Cheers" and its spin-off "Frasier." He was born on February 21, 1955, in Charlotte Amalie, Saint Thomas, in the U.S. Virgin Islands. As of 2023, Kelsey Grammer is 68 years old. Throughout his career, Grammer has been acclaimed for his versatility and has received multiple awards, including several Primetime Emmy Awards and Golden Globe Awards. Aside from his work in television, he has also appeared in various films, participated in Broadway productions, and has been involved in voice acting for animated films and series.

Meryl Streep.info: Meryl Streep is an esteemed American actress renowned for her versatility and depth in her acting roles. She was born on June 22, 1949, in Summit, New Jersey, USA. As of now, she is 74 years old. Meryl Streep's prolific career spans several decades, during which she has received numerous accolades, including multiple Academy Awards, Golden Globe Awards, and numerous other honors. Her performances in films such as "Sophie's Choice," "The Devil Wears Prada," and "The Iron Lady" have solidified her status as one of the most skilled and celebrated actors of her generation.

Tom Hanks.info:
Tom Hanks is an acclaimed American actor and filmmaker, known for his versatile performances in a wide range of film genres. He was born on July 9, 1956, in Concord, California, USA. As of 2023, Tom Hanks is 67 years old.

Throughout his prolific career, Hanks has become one of the most recognizable and beloved figures in Hollywood, starring in iconic films such as "Forrest Gump," "Saving Private Ryan," "Cast Away," and the "Toy Story" series, among many others. He has received numerous awards, including two consecutive Academy Awards for Best Actor for his roles in "Philadelphia" (1993) and "Forrest Gump" (1994).

Hanks is also highly respected for his work behind the camera as a producer and director, contributing to a variety of successful film and television projects. Known for his warm personality and strong work ethic, he continues to be a significant influence in the entertainment industry.

Jack Nicholson.info: Jack Nicholson is a renowned American actor and filmmaker known for his versatile roles in films spanning several decades. He was born on April 22, 1937, in Neptune City, New Jersey, USA. As of October 2023, he is 86 years old. Nicholson has had a distinguished career, featuring iconic performances in movies such as "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest," "The Shining," and "As Good as It Gets," earning him multiple Academy Awards and critical acclaim. His contributions to the film industry have made him one of Hollywood's most respected and enduring figures.

Demi Moore.info: Demi Moore is an American actress and film producer, born on November 11, 1962, in Roswell, New Mexico, USA. As of 2023, she is 60 years old. Moore gained fame in the 1980s and 1990s with roles in films such as "St. Elmo's Fire," "Ghost," "A Few Good Men," "Indecent Proposal," and "Disclosure." She was also one of the highest-paid actresses of her time and is noted for her roles in both dramatic and comedic films. Beyond her acting career, she has been involved in producing and philanthropy.

Kevin Pollak.info: Kevin Pollak is an American actor, comedian, and impressionist born on October 30, 1957, in San Francisco, California, USA. As of today, he is 65 years old. Pollak is known for his work in both film and television, with notable roles in movies such as "A Few Good Men," "The Usual Suspects," and "Casino." Additionally, he has gained recognition for his podcast, "Kevin Pollak's Chat Show," where he interviews various celebrities. Known for his comedic talent, Pollak is also renowned for his ability to impersonate a wide array of celebrities.

Gary Oldman.info: Gary Oldman is a highly acclaimed English actor and filmmaker, known for his versatility and intense performances. He was born on March 21, 1958, in New Cross, London, England. As of 2023, Gary Oldman is 65 years old. Over his illustrious career, he has appeared in a wide range of films and roles, including iconic characters in movies such as "Dracula", "The Dark Knight" trilogy, "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy", and "Darkest Hour", for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of Winston Churchill.

Sean Penn.info: Sean Penn is an American actor, filmmaker, and political activist. He was born on August 17, 1960, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of the current year, 2023, he is 63 years old. Penn is known for his versatile acting skills and has received acclaim for his roles in various films, including "Mystic River," for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor, and "Milk," for which he won a second Oscar in the same category. Beyond acting, Penn is recognized for his humanitarian efforts and outspoken political views.

Forest Whitaker.info: Forest Whitaker is an accomplished American actor, producer, and director known for his dynamic roles and powerful performances. He was born on July 15, 1961, in Longview, Texas, USA. As of 2023, Forest Whitaker is 62 years old. Over his career, Whitaker has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of Idi Amin in the film "The Last King of Scotland" (2006). Known for his deep voice and empathetic portrayals, he has had a significant impact on both Hollywood and independent cinema. Whitaker has also been involved in various humanitarian efforts, highlighting his commitment to social issues beyond the entertainment industry.

Matt Dillon.info: Matt Dillon is an American actor born on February 18, 1964, in New Rochelle, New York, USA. As of now, he is 59 years old. Dillon rose to fame in the late 1970s and 1980s with his roles in films such as "My Bodyguard" (1980), "The Outsiders" (1983), and "Rumble Fish" (1983). He has continued to have a successful acting career with notable performances in movies like "Drugstore Cowboy" (1989), "There's Something About Mary" (1998), and "Crash" (2004), for which he received significant critical acclaim and several award nominations.

Marisa Tomei.info: Marisa Tomei is an American actress known for her versatile performances in both film and theater. She was born on December 4, 1964, in Brooklyn, New York, USA. As of now, Marisa Tomei is 58 years old. She gained widespread recognition for her role in the 1992 film "My Cousin Vinny," for which she won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. Over the years, she has continued to build a successful career in Hollywood, appearing in various acclaimed films and television series.

Elisabeth Shue.info: Elisabeth Shue is an American actress born on October 6, 1963, in Wilmington, Delaware, USA. As of October 2023, she is 60 years old. Shue is well known for her roles in films such as "The Karate Kid" (1984), "Back to the Future Part II" (1989) and its sequel "Back to the Future Part III" (1990), "Adventures in Babysitting" (1987), and "Leaving Las Vegas" (1995), for which she received an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress. She has also appeared in the television series "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation" and "The Boys". With a career spanning several decades, Elisabeth Shue has established herself as a versatile actress with a diverse filmography.

Maggie Gyllenhaal.info:
Maggie Gyllenhaal, born Margalit Ruth Gyllenhaal, is an American actress and filmmaker. She was born on November 16, 1977, in New York City, New York, USA. As of October 2023, she is 45 years old.

Maggie comes from a family with strong ties to the film industry. Her parents, Stephen Gyllenhaal and Naomi Foner, are both filmmakers, and her brother is actor Jake Gyllenhaal. She has established a successful career in acting, known for her performances in films such as "Secretary" (2002), "The Dark Knight" (2008), and "Crazy Heart" (2009). Maggie has also ventured into directing and writing, with her directorial debut being the film "The Lost Daughter" (2021), for which she received critical acclaim.

Dustin Hoffman.info: Dustin Hoffman is an acclaimed American actor known for his versatile roles in film, television, and theater. He was born on August 8, 1937, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of 2023, Dustin Hoffman is 86 years old. Throughout his illustrious career, he has been celebrated for his performances in a variety of genres, earning numerous awards and nominations, including multiple Academy Awards. His most notable films include "The Graduate," "Kramer vs. Kramer," "Rain Man," and "Tootsie," which have cemented his status as a significant figure in American cinema.

Christian Slater.info: Christian Slater is an American actor known for his roles in both film and television. He was born on August 18, 1969, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 54 years old. He started his acting career as a child with roles in television shows and films during the 1980s, gaining fame with his performance in the cult classic "Heathers" (1988). Throughout his career, Slater has appeared in a variety of genres, showcasing his versatility as an actor. Some of his notable works include "True Romance," "Interview with the Vampire," and "Mr. Robot," for which he received critical acclaim and several awards.

Alec Baldwin.info: Alec Baldwin is an American actor, writer, producer, and comedian. He was born on April 3, 1958, in Amityville, New York, USA. As of October 2023, he is 65 years old. Baldwin has had a prolific career in film, television, and on stage, known for his versatility and distinctive voice. He gained widespread recognition for his roles in movies like "The Hunt for Red October," "Glengarry Glen Ross," and the "Mission: Impossible" series, as well as his role on the television series "30 Rock," for which he received critical acclaim and numerous awards. Alec Baldwin is also noted for his impersonation of Donald Trump on "Saturday Night Live," which earned him a Primetime Emmy Award.

Donald Sutherland.info: Donald Sutherland is a highly respected Canadian actor known for his extensive film career spanning several decades. He was born on July 17, 1935, in Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada. As of now, he is 88 years old. Sutherland has appeared in numerous iconic films, including "M*A*S*H," "Don't Look Now," "Invasion of the Body Snatchers," and "The Hunger Games" series, showcasing his versatility and talent across various genres. He has received significant recognition for his contributions to the film industry, including an honorary Oscar for his lifetime achievements.

Sissy Spacek.info: Sissy Spacek, an acclaimed American actress and singer, was born on December 25, 1949, in Quitman, Texas, USA. As of now, she is 73 years old. Spacek gained prominence for her role in the iconic 1976 film "Carrie," which earned her an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress. Over the years, she has won numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance in the 1980 film "Coal Miner's Daughter." Known for her versatile talent and compelling character portrayals, Spacek's career spans several decades, encompassing diverse roles in both film and television.

Sarah Jessica Parker.info: Sarah Jessica Parker is an American actress and producer best known for her role as Carrie Bradshaw on the HBO television series "Sex and the City." She was born on March 25, 1965, in Nelsonville, Ohio, USA. As of 2023, she is 58 years old. Parker's career spans several decades, encompassing a variety of roles in film, television, and theater. Beyond her work on "Sex and the City," she has appeared in films such as "Hocus Pocus," "The Family Stone," and "Failure to Launch." Additionally, she has been involved in fashion design and production work.

Oliver Platt.info: Oliver Platt is a Canadian-born actor renowned for his versatile roles in television and film. He was born on January 12, 1960, in Windsor, Ontario, Canada. As of 2023, he is 63 years old. Platt has built a substantial career with his performances in various genres, showcasing his ability to embody diverse characters. Some of his notable works include roles in "Flatliners," "The Three Musketeers," "A Time to Kill," "Frost/Nixon," and the TV series "Chicago Med." Known for his robust screen presence and expressive acting skills, Platt continues to be a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

James McAvoy.info: James McAvoy is a Scottish actor born on April 21, 1979, in Glasgow, Scotland. As of now, he is 44 years old. McAvoy has established a distinguished career in film, television, and theatre. He is known for his versatility and has received critical acclaim for his roles in movies such as "Atonement," "The Last King of Scotland," and as Professor Charles Xavier in the "X-Men" series. His talent and dedication to his craft have made him a well-respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Michael Fassbender.info: Michael Fassbender is an Irish-German actor born on April 2, 1977, in Heidelberg, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany. He is 46 years old as of 2023. Fassbender gained widespread recognition and acclaim for his roles in a variety of films, including those in the "X-Men" series, where he portrayed the character of Magneto, and in movies like "12 Years a Slave," and "Steve Jobs." Fassbender is celebrated for his versatility and depth in acting, often taking on complex and challenging roles.

Jennifer Lawrence.info: Jennifer Lawrence is an acclaimed American actress born on August 15, 1990, in Indian Hills, Kentucky. As of 2023, she is 33 years old. Lawrence gained widespread recognition and fame for her roles in films such as the "Hunger Games" series, where she played the protagonist Katniss Everdeen, and the "X-Men" series where she portrayed the character Mystique. Her performance in "Silver Linings Playbook" earned her an Academy Award for Best Actress in 2013, making her one of the youngest actresses to ever receive an Oscar in that category. With her charming performances and strong screen presence, Jennifer Lawrence has become one of Hollywood's most recognized and successful actresses.

Rose Byrne.info: Rose Byrne is an Australian actress born on July 24, 1979, in Balmain, a suburb of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. As of October 2023, she is 44 years old. Rose Byrne has established a successful career in both film and television, known for her versatility and range in roles across different genres. Some of her notable works include "Bridesmaids," "X-Men: First Class," "28 Weeks Later," and the TV series "Damages."

Emma Thompson.info: Emma Thompson is a highly acclaimed British actress, screenwriter, and producer. She was born on April 15, 1959, in Paddington, London, England. As of October 2023, she is 64 years old. Known for her versatility and intelligence, Thompson has received numerous awards throughout her career, including two Academy Awards, two Golden Globe Awards, and a BAFTA Award. She is recognized for her roles in films such as "Howards End," "Sense and Sensibility," "The Remains of the Day," and the "Harry Potter" series. Besides acting, she has also been influential as a screenwriter, most notably adapting Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" for which she won an Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay.

Colin Firth.info: Colin Firth is a British actor born on September 10, 1960, in Grayshott, Hampshire, England. As of 2023, he is 63 years old. Renowned for his versatility and depth, Firth has gained recognition for his roles in both film and television. He won an Academy Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of King George VI in "The King's Speech" (2010) and has appeared in a range of significant films, including "Pride and Prejudice" (1995), "Bridget Jones's Diary" (2001), and "A Single Man" (2009).

Elizabeth Perkins.info: Elizabeth Perkins is an American actress known for her roles in both films and television. She was born on November 18, 1960, in Queens, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 62 years old. Perkins gained recognition for her performance in the 1988 film "Big," where she starred opposite Tom Hanks. Her career spans a variety of genres, and she has appeared in notable films such as "The Flintstones," "Miracle on 34th Street," and "Finding Nemo," where she provided the voice for the character Coral. In addition to her film work, Perkins has received acclaim for her television roles, including her portrayal of Celia Hodes on the series "Weeds," for which she received several award nominations.

Helen Hunt.info: Helen Hunt is an American actress, director, and producer, widely recognized for her work in film and television. She was born on June 15, 1963, in Culver City, California, USA. As of October 2023, Helen Hunt is 60 years old. She gained prominence for her role in the television sitcom "Mad About You," which earned her several awards, including a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series. In addition to her television success, she has had a successful film career, including winning an Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in the film "As Good as It Gets."

Steve Guttenberg.info: Steve Guttenberg is an American actor, author, businessman, producer, and director, born on August 24, 1958, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 65 years old. Guttenberg gained fame in the 1980s for his roles in popular films such as "Police Academy," "Cocoon," "Three Men and a Baby," and "Short Circuit." Known for his comedic timing and approachable on-screen persona, he became a beloved figure in the entertainment industry. Throughout his career, Guttenberg has continued to work in film, television, and theater, showcasing his versatile skills as an entertainer.

Tom Selleck.info:
Tom Selleck is an American actor and film producer, renowned for his distinctive mustache, charm, and roles in television and film. He was born on January 29, 1945, in Detroit, Michigan, USA. As of October 2023, Tom Selleck is 78 years old. 

He gained fame for his role as Thomas Magnum in the hit television series "Magnum, P.I.," which aired from 1980 to 1988. Selleck has also appeared in numerous films, including "Three Men and a Baby" (1987), "Quigley Down Under" (1990), and "Mr. Baseball" (1992). In addition, he has played a recurring role as Dr. Richard Burke on the popular TV show "Friends" and currently stars as Frank Reagan in the series "Blue Bloods," which has been on air since 2010. Throughout his career, Tom Selleck has been appreciated for his versatility and enduring presence in the entertainment industry.

Edward Herrmann.info:
Edward Herrmann was an American actor known for his distinctive voice and a career that spanned over several decades in film, television, and theater. He was born on July 21, 1943, in Washington, D.C., USA. Herrmann was widely recognized for his tall stature and often portrayed affluent and authoritative figures.

He gained prominence for his roles in films such as "The Lost Boys," "Overboard," and "Richie Rich." Edward Herrmann also became a beloved figure for his portrayal of Richard Gilmore on the popular television series "Gilmore Girls." Aside from his acting career, Herrmann was an accomplished narrator, lending his voice to numerous television specials and documentaries, particularly for the History Channel and PBS.

Edward Herrmann passed away on December 31, 2014, at the age of 71, due to complications from brain cancer. His contributions to the arts have left a lasting impact, and he is fondly remembered by fans and colleagues alike.

Mary-Louise Parker.info: Mary-Louise Parker is an American actress born on August 2, 1964, in Fort Jackson, South Carolina, USA. As of now, she is 59 years old. Parker is known for her work in both film and television. She gained significant recognition for her role in the television series "Weeds," and has also appeared in movies such as "The Client," "Fried Green Tomatoes," and "Red." In addition to her acting career, Parker has been recognized with several awards, including a Tony Award for Best Actress for her role in the stage play "Proof."

Dennis Quaid.info: Dennis Quaid is an American actor known for his versatile performances in both dramatic and comedic roles. He was born on April 9, 1954, in Houston, Texas, USA. As of now, he is 69 years old. Over the course of his career, Quaid has starred in a variety of films, including "The Right Stuff," "Frequency," "The Day After Tomorrow," and "The Parent Trap," showcasing his ability to tackle diverse genres and character types. Quaid has earned recognition not just for his talent but also for his charismatic on-screen presence.

Courtney Cox.info: Courteney Cox is an American actress born on June 15, 1964, in Birmingham, Alabama, USA. As of now, she is 59 years old. Cox is best known for her role as Monica Geller on the popular television sitcom "Friends," which aired from 1994 to 2004. Her performance in the series earned her critical acclaim and a massive fan following. Additionally, she has had notable roles in other TV shows and films, such as the "Scream" film series and "Cougar Town," in which she played the lead role. Beyond acting, Courteney Cox has also ventured into directing and producing.

Julianne Nicholson.info: Julianne Nicholson is an accomplished American actress known for her work in both film and television. She was born on July 1, 1971, in Medford, Massachusetts, USA. As of now, she is 52 years old. Nicholson has earned critical acclaim for her versatile performances and has appeared in a variety of roles across different genres. Some of her notable work includes her roles in television series such as "Law & Order: Criminal Intent," "Masters of Sex," and "Mare of Easttown," as well as films like "August: Osage County" and "I, Tonya." Her talent and dedication have made her a respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Juliette Lewis.info: Juliette Lewis is an American actress and singer born on June 21, 1973, in Los Angeles, California. As of 2023, she is 50 years old. Juliette Lewis is known for her dynamic and often intense performances across a variety of roles in film and television. She gained prominence in the early 1990s with standout roles in films such as "Cape Fear" (1991), which earned her an Academy Award nomination, and "Natural Born Killers" (1994). In addition to her acting career, Lewis is also known for her music, having fronted the rock band Juliette and the Licks. Her work in the entertainment industry has made her a distinctive and influential figure.

Vincent D\u2019Onofrio.info: Vincent D’Onofrio is an American actor, producer, director, and singer, known for his versatility and powerful performances. He was born on June 30, 1959, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. This makes him 64 years old as of 2023. D'Onofrio is perhaps best known for his roles in films such as "Full Metal Jacket" (1987), where he portrayed Private Leonard "Gomer Pyle" Lawrence, "Men in Black" (1997) as Edgar the Bug, and the critically acclaimed TV series "Law & Order: Criminal Intent" where he played Detective Robert Goren. His unique ability to immerse himself in various characters has earned him a reputation as a skilled and dedicated actor.

John C. Reilly.info: John C. Reilly is an American actor, comedian, singer, and producer known for his versatility and work in both comedic and dramatic roles. He was born on May 24, 1965, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. As of now, John C. Reilly is 58 years old. Over his career, he has appeared in a wide range of films including "Chicago," "Gangs of New York," and "Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story," among many others. He has also made significant contributions to the animated film industry with voice acting roles in series such as "Wreck-It Ralph." Known for his unique talent and wide appeal, he continues to be a prominent figure in both television and cinema.

Tom Sturridge.info: Tom Sturridge is an English actor born on December 21, 1985, in London, England. As of 2023, he is 37 years old. Sturridge hails from a family with strong ties to the entertainment industry, as his mother, Phoebe Nicholls, and father, Charles Sturridge, are both involved in acting and directing, respectively. Tom Sturridge is known for his roles in films such as "The Boat That Rocked" (2009) and "On the Road" (2012), as well as appearing in the Netflix series "The Sandman" in 2022, where he played the character Dream/Morpheus. Throughout his career, he has been recognized for his ability to take on diverse and complex roles both on stage and screen.

Boyd Holbrook.info: Boyd Holbrook is an American actor and model. He was born on September 1, 1981, in Prestonsburg, Kentucky, USA. As of October 2023, Boyd Holbrook is 42 years old. He has appeared in a variety of films and television series, earning recognition for his roles in projects such as "Narcos," "Logan," and "The Sandman." Before his acting career took off, Holbrook also worked as a model, appearing in campaigns for major fashion brands.

Christoph Waltz.info:
Christoph Waltz is an accomplished Austrian-German actor, renowned for his work in both European and American cinema. He was born on October 4, 1956, in Vienna, Austria. As of now, Christoph Waltz is 67 years old.

Waltz gained international recognition and acclaim for his collaborations with director Quentin Tarantino, particularly for his roles as SS Colonel Hans Landa in "Inglourious Basterds" (2009) and bounty hunter Dr. King Schultz in "Django Unchained" (2012). Both performances earned him numerous awards, including two Academy Awards for Best Supporting Actor. Waltz is celebrated for his multilingual skills, often playing characters that speak various languages, and his ability to bring depth and nuance to complex characters.

Jodie Foster.info: Jodie Foster, whose full name is Alicia Christian Foster, is an acclaimed American actress, director, and producer. She was born on November 19, 1962, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of now, she is 60 years old. Foster began her career at a very young age, gaining critical recognition and numerous awards for her performances in films such as "Taxi Driver," "The Silence of the Lambs," and "The Accused." Over the years, she has earned a reputation for her versatility and intelligence, both in front of and behind the camera.

Robert De Niro.info: Robert De Niro is an acclaimed American actor, producer, and director known for his powerful performances in a wide range of films. He was born on August 17, 1943, in Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Robert De Niro is 80 years old. He has had a prolific career spanning several decades, earning numerous awards, including two Academy Awards for his roles in "The Godfather Part II" (1974) and "Raging Bull" (1980). De Niro is particularly celebrated for his collaborations with director Martin Scorsese, which have cemented his status as one of the greatest actors in the history of film.

Christina Ricci.info: Christina Ricci is an American actress known for her eclectic choice of roles in both independent and mainstream films. She was born on February 12, 1980, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of October 2023, she is 43 years old. Ricci gained prominence as a child actress in the 1990s with standout performances in films such as "The Addams Family" (1991) and its sequel, "Addams Family Values" (1993), where she played the iconic role of Wednesday Addams. Over the years, she has continued to diversify her body of work, taking on challenging roles in movies such as "Monster" (2003), "Black Snake Moan" (2006), and the television series "Yellowjackets" (2021-present).

Cameron Diaz.info: Cameron Diaz is an American actress, producer, and author born on August 30, 1972, in San Diego, California, USA. As of now, she is 51 years old. Diaz gained fame in the 1990s with roles in movies such as "The Mask" (1994) and "There's Something About Mary" (1998), and she continued to build a successful career with a diverse range of roles in both comedies and dramas. Known for her charismatic presence and versatile acting skills, she became one of Hollywood's leading actresses until her retirement from acting in 2014. Since then, Diaz has shifted focus to other pursuits, including writing and business ventures.

Will Ferrell.info:

Keanu Reeves.info: Keanu Reeves is a Canadian actor born on September 2, 1964, in Beirut, Lebanon. As of October 2023, he is 59 years old. Some of his most iconic roles include Neo in "The Matrix" series and John Wick in the "John Wick" franchise. His career spans over several decades, making him one of the most enduring and popular actors in the industry.

Carrie-Anne Moss.info: Carrie-Anne Moss is a Canadian actress best known for her role as Trinity in the "Matrix" film series. She was born on August 21, 1967, in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada. Hugo Weaving.info: Hugo Weaving is a distinguished actor born on April 4, 1960, in Ibadan, Nigeria. As of now, he is 63 years old. Jon Voight.info:
Jon Voight is an acclaimed American actor known for his extensive career in film and television. He was born on December 29, 1938, in Yonkers, New York, USA. As of now, Jon Voight is 84 years old.

Christian Bale.info: Christian Bale is a renowned actor known for his versatility and commitment to his roles. He was born on January 30, 1974, in Haverfordwest, Pembrokeshire, Wales. Diane Lane.info: Diane Lane is an American actress known for her extensive work in film, television, and theater. She was born on January 22, 1965, in New York City, New York, USA. Gene Hackman.info: Gene Hackman is a retired American actor and novelist who was born on January 30, 1930, in San Bernardino, California, USA. As of 2023, Hackman is 93 years old. Some of his most notable films include "The French Connection," for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor, "Unforgiven," which earned him a second Oscar for Best Supporting Actor, and "Hoosiers." Despite retiring from acting in 2004, Hackman's contributions to the film industry remain highly respected.

Angela Bassett.info:
Angela Bassett is an esteemed American actress known for her powerful performances in film, television, and theater. She was born on August 16, 1958, in New York City, New York. As of October 2023, Angela Bassett is 65 years old.

Samuel L. Jackson.info:

Matt Damon.info: Matt Damon is an American actor, screenwriter, and producer, known for his versatility and wide range of roles in film. Cuba Gooding Jr..info: Cuba Gooding Jr. is an American actor known for his roles in films such as "Boyz n the Hood," "Jerry Maguire," and "Men of Honor." Jada Pinkett Smith.info: Jada Pinkett Smith is an American actress, producer, director, author, and businesswoman. She was born on September 18, 1971, in Baltimore, Maryland, USA. Jason Statham.info: Jason Statham is a well-known British actor and film producer famous for his roles in action films. He was born on July 26, 1967, in Shirebrook, Derbyshire, England. Sam Neill.info: Sam Neill is a renowned actor born on September 14, 1947, in Omagh, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland. As of 2023, Sam Neill is 76 years old. Anjelica Huston.info: Anjelica Huston is an acclaimed American actress and director, known for her versatile performances and strong screen presence. Ian McShane.info: Ian McShane is an English actor born on September 29, 1942, in Blackburn, Lancashire, England. As of now, he is 81 years old. Keira Knightley.info: Keira Knightley is an English actress born on March 26, 1985, in Teddington, London, England. As of now, she is 38 years old. Andrew Lincoln.info: Andrew Lincoln, born Andrew James Clutterbuck, is an English actor best known for his role as Rick Grimes in the popular television series "The Walking Dead." Jim Carrey.info: Jim Carrey is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, writer, and producer known for his energetic slapstick performances and his versatility in various film genres. Laurie Metcalf.info: Laurie Metcalf, an acclaimed American actress, was born on June 16, 1955, in Carbondale, Illinois. As of now, she is 68 years old. Danny DeVito.info: Danny DeVito is an American actor, producer, and director known for his distinctive voice and comedic timing. Jane Fonda.info: Jane Fonda is a renowned American actress, born on December 21, 1937, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 85 years old. Mel Gibson.info: Mel Gibson is an American-Australian actor, film director, and producer, renowned for his performances in films like "Braveheart" and "Mad Max." Edward Norton.info: Edward Norton is an American actor and filmmaker known for his versatility and intense performances in films. Steve Carell.info: Steve Carell is an American actor and comedian best known for his role as Michael Scott on the U.S. version of "The Office." Marc Almond.info: Marc Almond is an English singer and musician, best known as the frontman of the synth-pop duo Soft Cell. He was born on July 9, 1957, in Southport, Lancashire, England. Almond gained prominence in the 1980s with hits such as "Tainted Love" and has since pursued a successful solo career, with a distinctive style that blends elements of pop, new wave, and pop rock. His contributions to music have earned him a cult following and recognition as an iconic figure in the British music scene.

Bryan Cranston.info: Bryan Cranston is an American actor and filmmaker, best known for his roles as Walter White on the critically acclaimed TV series "Breaking Bad" and Hal on the sitcom "Malcolm in the Middle." Joseph Gordon-Levitt.info: Joseph Gordon-Levitt is an American actor, filmmaker, and entrepreneur. He was born in Los Angeles, California, on February 17, 1981. As of now, he is 42 years old. Sylvester Stallone.info: Sylvester Stallone, born on July 6, 1946, is an American actor, director, screenwriter, and producer. He was born in New York City, New York, USA. Sigourney Weaver.info:

She gained fame for her portrayal of Ellen Ripley in the "Alien" franchise, which established her as one of the first female action heroes in cinema. Throughout her career, she has received numerous accolades, including several Academy Award nominations, particularly for her roles in "Aliens" (1986), "Gorillas in the Mist" (1988), and "Working Girl" (1988). Walter Matthau.info:

Matthau is best remembered for his roles in comedic films, particularly his collaboration with Jack Lemmon in classics like "The Odd Couple" (1968) and "Grumpy Old Men" (1993).

Walter Matthau passed away on July 1, 2000, at the age of 79. His career spanned several decades, during which he became celebrated for his versatile acting skills and his ability to portray both comedic and dramatic roles with equal flair. His performances have left a lasting impact on the entertainment industry, and he is remembered as one of Hollywood's iconic talents.

Jack Lemmon.info:

Lemmon had a celebrated career that included memorable performances in films such as "Some Like It Hot," "The Apartment," "Days of Wine and Roses," and "Grumpy Old Men," among many others. 

He was known for his versatility, excelling in both comedic and dramatic roles, and was a frequent collaborator with actor Walter Matthau. Jack Lemmon received numerous accolades during his career, including two Academy Awards.

Jack Lemmon passed away on June 27, 2001, at the age of 76 in Los Angeles, California. His legacy continues to influence and inspire actors and filmmakers.

Reese Witherspoon.info: Reese Witherspoon is an American actress and producer, known for her versatile roles in both film and television. Jeff Bridges.info:

Warwick Davis.info: Warwick Davis is a British actor known for his roles in film franchises like "Star Wars," "Harry Potter," and "Leprechaun." Despite this, he has had a successful acting career, often taking on roles specifically written for little people and bringing a unique presence to each character he portrays. He is also recognized for his work as a presenter and producer, further contributing to the entertainment industry in various capacities.

Craig Robinson.info: Craig Robinson is an American actor and comedian known for his roles in television and film. He was born on October 25, 1971, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. Andrea Martin.info: Andrea Martin is a Canadian-American actress and comedian known for her work in television, film, and theater. She was born on January 15, 1947, in Portland, Maine, USA. Renee Zellweger.info: Renée Zellweger is an acclaimed American actress born on April 25, 1969, in Katy, Texas. As of October 2023, she is 54 years old. Zellweger has had a successful acting career, best known for her roles in films like "Jerry Maguire," "Bridget Jones's Diary," and "Chicago." Kevin Kline.info: Kevin Kline is an American actor known for his versatility in both comedic and dramatic roles. He was born on October 24, 1947, in St. Louis, Missouri, USA. Morgan Freeman.info:

John Travolta.info: John Travolta is an American actor, singer, and dancer, known for his work in film, television, and on stage. He was born on February 18, 1954, in Englewood, New Jersey, USA. Dan Aykroyd.info: Dan Aykroyd is a Canadian actor, comedian, musician, and filmmaker, born on July 1, 1952, in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. Carrie Fisher.info:
Carrie Fisher was an American actress and writer, best known for her iconic role as Princess Leia in the "Star Wars" film series. She was born on October 21, 1956, in Burbank, California, USA. Fisher was the daughter of singer Eddie Fisher and actress Debbie Reynolds, which exposed her to the entertainment industry from a young age.

Fisher began her career in her teens, and alongside her acting, she was also a renowned writer, penning several books including the semi-autobiographical novel "Postcards from the Edge." Her wit and candidness, especially about her battles with addiction and mental health, made her a beloved figure not just as an actress, but also as a voice for mental health awareness.

Sadly, Carrie Fisher passed away at the age of 60 on December 27, 2016, in Los Angeles, California. Despite her untimely death, her legacy continues to influence and inspire many in the realms of film, literature, and beyond.

Harold Ramis.info: Harold Ramis was a renowned American actor, director, writer, and comedian. He was born on November 21, 1944, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. Chevy Chase.info: Chevy Chase is an American actor, comedian, and writer, known for his work in television and film. He was born on October 8, 1943, in Lower Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA. Jane Curtin.info: Jane Curtin is an American actress and comedian born on September 6, 1947, in Cambridge, Massachusetts. As of October 2023, she is 76 years old. Steve Martin.info: Steve Martin is an American actor, comedian, writer, and musician, known for his work in film and television as well as his talents in banjo playing. Bill Murray.info: Bill Murray is an American actor, comedian, and writer renowned for his deadpan delivery and distinctive comedic style. John Candy.info: John Candy was a Canadian actor and comedian known for his roles in films such as "Planes, Trains and Automobiles", "Uncle Buck", and "Cool Runnings". She gained fame in the late 1990s for her role in the Australian soap opera "Home and Away" before advancing to a successful career in Hollywood with notable roles in films such as "Wedding Crashers," "Confessions of a Shopaholic," and "Now You See Me." Fisher is also a published author, having written the popular "Marge in Charge" children's book series.

Justin Theroux.info: Justin Theroux is an American actor, producer, director, and screenwriter known for his work in both film and television. He was born on August 10, 1971, in Washington, D.C., United States. As of now, Theroux is 52 years old. He has appeared in a variety of roles, gaining recognition for his performances in television series like "The Leftovers" and films like "Mulholland Drive," "American Psycho," "The Girl on the Train," and "Zoolander 2," among others. Theroux is also known for contributing to screenwriting, having co-written screenplays for movies such as "Tropic Thunder" and "Iron Man 2."

Tig Notaro.info: Tig Notaro is an American stand-up comedian, writer, radio contributor, and actress. She was born Mathilde O'Callaghan Notaro on March 24, 1971, in Jackson, Mississippi, USA. As of 2023, she is 52 years old. Tig Notaro is known for her deadpan delivery and her work in comedy that often draws on her personal experiences. In addition to her stand-up career, she has appeared in various television shows and films and is also known for her work on the radio.

Kathryn Hahn.info: Kathryn Hahn is an American actress born on July 23, 1973, in Westchester, Illinois, USA. As of now, she is 50 years old. Hahn has gained recognition for her versatile acting skills in both comedic and dramatic roles across film and television. She has appeared in popular projects such as "Bad Moms," "Step Brothers," and the critically acclaimed TV series "WandaVision," where she portrayed the character Agatha Harkness. Her ability to portray diverse characters with depth and humor has earned her a respected place in the entertainment industry.

Jake Gyllenhaal.info: Jake Gyllenhaal is an American actor known for his versatile roles in films ranging from dramas to thrillers and action movies. He was born on December 19, 1980, in Los Angeles, California, United States. As of 2023, Jake Gyllenhaal is 42 years old. Coming from a family with strong ties to the film industry, Jake has built a successful career with critically acclaimed performances in movies such as "Donnie Darko," "Brokeback Mountain," "Nightcrawler," and "Spider-Man: Far From Home," among others.

Winona Ryder.info: Winona Ryder, born Winona Laura Horowitz, is an American actress known for her work in film and television. She was born on October 29, 1971, in Winona, Minnesota, USA. As of now, she is 51 years old. Ryder rose to fame in the late 1980s and early 1990s with roles in films such as "Beetlejuice" (1988), "Heathers" (1989), and "Edward Scissorhands" (1990). Her performances in "The Age of Innocence" (1993) and "Little Women" (1994) earned her critical acclaim and several award nominations. In recent years, she has gained a new generation of fans with her role as Joyce Byers in the popular Netflix series "Stranger Things."

Patricia Arquette.info: Patricia Arquette is an American actress known for her versatile performances in film and television. She was born on April 8, 1968, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. As of now, Patricia Arquette is 55 years old. Arquette comes from a family with a rich history in the entertainment industry; she is one of the five children of Lewis Arquette, an actor and director, and her siblings also include actors like Rosanna, David, Richmond, and Alexis Arquette. Throughout her career, Patricia Arquette has received critical acclaim and numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "Boyhood" (2014), and multiple Emmy Awards for her outstanding performances on television.

Richard Dreyfuss.info: Richard Dreyfuss is an acclaimed American actor known for his roles in several iconic films. He was born on October 29, 1947, in Brooklyn, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 75 years old. Dreyfuss gained significant recognition for his performances in films such as "Jaws" (1975), "Close Encounters of the Third Kind" (1977), and "The Goodbye Girl" (1977), for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor. His career spans several decades, and he is celebrated for his versatility and compelling screen presence.

Woody Allen.info: Woody Allen, born Allan Stewart Konigsberg on December 1, 1935, is an American filmmaker, actor, and comedian. He was born in Brooklyn, New York City, New York. As of now, he is 87 years old. Allen is renowned for his prolific career in the entertainment industry, having written and directed numerous films known for their unique blend of humor, romance, and introspection. Over the years, he has become an influential figure in cinema, earning multiple awards including several Academy Awards.

Greg Kinnear.info: Greg Kinnear is an American actor known for his versatile performances in both film and television. He was born on June 17, 1963, in Logansport, Indiana, USA. Over his career, he has received acclaim for his roles in movies such as "As Good as It Gets," for which he earned an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor, "Little Miss Sunshine," and "You've Got Mail," among others. Carla Gugino.info: Carla Gugino is an American actress born on August 29, 1971, in Sarasota, Florida, USA. As of now, she is 52 years old. Gugino has built a diverse career in film and television, known for her versatile roles across various genres. Some of her notable performances include roles in movies such as "Spy Kids," "Sin City," and "Night at the Museum," as well as television series like "The Haunting of Hill House" and "Watchmen." Her career spans over three decades, during which she has been praised for her talent and consistently strong performances.

Michael J. Fox.info: Michael J. Fox is a Canadian-American actor who was born on June 9, 1961, in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. As of 2023, he is 62 years old. Fox is best known for his role as Marty McFly in the "Back to the Future" film series, as well as his work on the television series "Family Ties" and "Spin City." Beyond his acting career, he is also recognized for his activism and efforts to raise awareness about Parkinson's disease, with which he was diagnosed in 1991.

Elliott Gould.info: Elliott Gould is an American actor born on August 29, 1938, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. As of the current year, 2023, he is 85 years old. Gould gained prominence in the late 1960s and 1970s with roles in notable films such as "Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice" (1969), "M*A*S*H" (1970), and "The Long Goodbye" (1973). Beyond his film work, he has also appeared in various television shows and has had a longstanding career in the entertainment industry.

Holly Hunter.info: Holly Hunter is an accomplished American actress known for her versatility and powerful performances. She was born on March 20, 1958, in Conyers, Georgia, United States. As of 2023, she is 65 years old. Holly Hunter gained widespread recognition for her role in the 1993 film "The Piano," for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress. Throughout her career, she has received numerous accolades and nominations, showcasing her talent across various genres in both film and television.

Eric Stoltz.info: Eric Stoltz is an American actor, director, and producer born on September 30, 1961, in Whittier, California, USA. As of October 2023, he is 62 years old. Stoltz is known for his roles in films such as "Mask" (1985), in which he starred opposite Cher, and "Pulp Fiction" (1994), directed by Quentin Tarantino. Additionally, he has had a career in television, including appearances on shows like "Mad About You" and "Caprica." Over the years, Stoltz has also gained recognition for his work behind the camera, directing several television episodes for series such as "Glee" and "Madam Secretary."

Melanie Griffith.info: Melanie Griffith is an American actress known for her work in film and television. She was born on August 9, 1957, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 66 years old. Griffith gained prominence for her performance in the film "Working Girl" (1988), which earned her a Golden Globe Award and an Academy Award nomination. She has appeared in a variety of roles throughout her career, showcasing her versatility as an actress. Griffith's parents are actress Tippi Hedren and advertising executive Peter Griffith. Over the years, she has been involved in various charitable activities and remains an influential figure in the entertainment industry.

Ted Danson.info: Ted Danson is an American actor best known for his role as Sam Malone on the television sitcom "Cheers" and as Michael in "The Good Place." He was born on December 29, 1947, in San Diego, California, United States. As of October 2023, Ted Danson is 75 years old. His career has spanned several decades, during which he has received critical acclaim and numerous awards for his performances both on television and in film.

Shelley Long.info: Shelley Long is an American actress best known for her role as Diane Chambers on the television sitcom "Cheers". She was born on August 23, 1949, in Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA. As of 2023, Shelley Long is 74 years old. Her performance on "Cheers" earned her several accolades, including an Emmy Award. Aside from "Cheers," she has appeared in various television shows and films, contributing to her reputation as a versatile actress.

Woody Harrelson.info: Woody Harrelson is an American actor and playwright. He was born on July 23, 1961, in Midland, Texas, USA. As of 2023, that makes him 62 years old. Harrelson is well-known for his roles in film and television, including notable performances in "Cheers" as Woody Boyd, and films such as "Natural Born Killers," "The People vs. Larry Flynt," "Zombieland," and "True Detective," among others. His extensive career has earned him various awards and nominations, including multiple Emmy Awards and Academy Award nominations.

Rhea Perlman.info: Rhea Perlman is an American actress, widely known for her role as Carla Tortelli in the television sitcom "Cheers." She was born on March 31, 1948, in Brooklyn, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 75 years old. Perlman's work has earned her multiple Primetime Emmy Awards, and she has had a substantial career in television and film. Besides "Cheers," she has appeared in various TV shows and movies, showcasing her talent in both comedic and dramatic roles.

John Mahoney.info:
John Mahoney was an English-American actor best known for his role as Martin Crane on the television show "Frasier." He was born on June 20, 1940, in Blackpool, Lancashire, England. Mahoney moved to the United States as a young adult and eventually became a U.S. citizen. He began his acting career on the stage and was a member of the Steppenwolf Theatre Company in Chicago. Over the years, he appeared in various films and television series.

John Mahoney passed away on February 4, 2018, at the age of 77, in Chicago, Illinois. Throughout his career, Mahoney was celebrated for his contributions to acting, both on screen and in theater.

David Hyde Pierce.info: David Hyde Pierce is an American actor and director, best known for his role as Dr. Niles Crane on the television series "Frasier." He was born on April 3, 1959, in Saratoga Springs, New York, USA. As of October 2023, David Hyde Pierce is 64 years old. He has received several awards for his acting, including a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series. Pierce has also had an extensive career on stage, including performances on Broadway.

Jane Leeves.info: Jane Leeves is an English actress, model, producer, and singer. She was born on April 18, 1961, in Ilford, Essex, England. As of 2023, she is 62 years old. Leeves is best known for her role as Daphne Moon on the television sitcom "Frasier," which aired from 1993 to 2004. In addition to her work on "Frasier," she has appeared in numerous other TV shows and films, including "Throb," "The Benny Hill Show," and "Hot in Cleveland."

Peri Gilpin.info: Peri Gilpin is an American actress best known for her role as Roz Doyle on the television series "Frasier." She was born on May 27, 1961, in Waco, Texas, United States. As of 2023, she is 62 years old. Throughout her career, Gilpin has appeared in various television shows and films, and she has also done voice work, notably for the character of Jane in the animated series "Tarzan and Jane."
