Bebe Neuwirth.info:
Bebe Neuwirth is an American actress, singer, and dancer primarily known for her work in theater, television, and film. She was born on December 31, 1958, in Newark, New Jersey, USA. As of now, she is 64 years old.

Bebe Neuwirth is renowned for her role as Dr. Lilith Sternin in the television series "Cheers" and its spin-off "Frasier." Additionally, she has had a distinguished career on Broadway, earning two Tony Awards for her performances in the musicals "Sweet Charity" and "Chicago." Neuwirth's talents extend beyond acting, as she is also an accomplished dancer and singer, having studied at Juilliard School's Dance Division. Her work in the entertainment industry has made her a well-respected and versatile performer.

John Ratzenberger.info: John Ratzenberger is an American actor and voice actor best known for his role as Cliff Clavin on the TV show "Cheers" and his extensive work as a voice actor in Pixar films. He was born on April 6, 1947, in Bridgeport, Connecticut, USA. As of 2023, he is 76 years old. Ratzenberger has enjoyed a long and versatile career, with notable appearances in both television and film, and his distinctive voice has contributed to the character of many beloved animated characters.

George Wendt.info: George Wendt is an American actor best known for his role as Norm Peterson on the television sitcom "Cheers." He was born on October 17, 1948, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. As of October 2023, he is 74 years old. Wendt's portrayal of Norm, the barfly with a heart of gold, made him a beloved character on the long-running show, which aired from 1982 to 1993. Besides "Cheers," Wendt has appeared in various films and television shows, showcasing his comedic talent and versatility as an actor.

Nicholas Lyndhurst.info: Nicholas Lyndhurst is a British actor born on April 20, 1961, in Emsworth, Hampshire, England. He is best known for his role as Rodney Trotter in the long-running and popular television series "Only Fools and Horses." As of today, he is 62 years old. Over the years, Lyndhurst has been recognized for his work in both television and theater, earning a respected place among British comedic actors.

Matthew Broderick.info: Matthew Broderick is an American actor known for his versatile roles in both film and theater. He was born on March 21, 1962, in Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA. As of now, he is 61 years old. Broderick gained widespread recognition for his role as the charming high school student Ferris Bueller in the iconic 1986 film "Ferris Bueller's Day Off." In addition to his film career, he has also enjoyed considerable success on stage, notably winning two Tony Awards for his performances in "Brighton Beach Memoirs" and "How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying." His career spans several decades, making him a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Pierce Brosnan.info: Pierce Brosnan is an Irish actor and film producer, best known for his role as James Bond in four films from 1995 to 2002. He was born on May 16, 1953, in Drogheda, County Louth, Ireland. As of 2023, Pierce Brosnan is 70 years old. Brosnan has had a successful career in both film and television, with notable roles in movies such as "The Thomas Crown Affair," "Mamma Mia!," and "The Ghost Writer." His charm and distinctive screen presence have made him a beloved figure in the entertainment industry. Apart from his film work, Brosnan is also recognized for his philanthropic efforts, particularly in environmental causes.

Nicolas Cage.info: Nicolas Cage, born Nicolas Kim Coppola, is an American actor and filmmaker known for his diverse and dynamic range of performances across various genres. He was born on January 7, 1964, in Long Beach, California, USA. As of 2023, Nicolas Cage is 59 years old. Cage comes from a prominent family in the entertainment industry, with his uncle being the acclaimed director Francis Ford Coppola. He gained significant attention for his roles in films such as "Leaving Las Vegas," for which he won an Academy Award, "Face/Off," "Con Air," and many others. Throughout his career, Cage has been recognized for his ability to take on both mainstream blockbuster roles and offbeat, indie film projects.

Julia Stiles.info: Julia Stiles is an American actress known for her work in both film and television. She was born on March 28, 1981, in New York City, New York, USA. As of October 2023, she is 42 years old. Stiles gained fame in the late 1990s and early 2000s with her roles in popular films such as "10 Things I Hate About You," "Save the Last Dance," and "The Bourne Identity" series. She has continued to have a successful career, appearing in various film and television projects over the years. Stiles is celebrated for her versatile acting skills and has also ventured into directing and producing.

David Spade.info: David Spade, born on July 22, 1964, is an American actor, comedian, and writer known for his dry wit and sarcastic humor. He was born in Birmingham, Michigan, and later moved with his family to Scottsdale, Arizona, where he was raised. As of October 2023, David Spade is 59 years old. He gained fame as a cast member on "Saturday Night Live" in the 1990s and has starred in various films and television shows, including "Just Shoot Me!" and "Joe Dirt."

Whoopi Goldberg.info: Whoopi Goldberg, whose birth name is Caryn Elaine Johnson, is a renowned American actress, comedian, author, and television personality. She was born on November 13, 1955, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Whoopi Goldberg is 67 years old. She has had a distinguished career spanning several decades, having won numerous awards, including an Academy Award, a Grammy Award, a Tony Award, and multiple Emmy Awards, making her one of the few entertainers to have achieved the EGOT status. She is well known for her roles in films such as "The Color Purple," "Ghost," and for her long-standing role as a co-host on the television show "The View."

Colette Mann.info: Colette Mann is an accomplished Australian actress, born on February 17, 1950, in Melbourne, Australia. This makes her 73 years old as of 2023. Mann is best known for her role as Sheila Canning on the long-running Australian soap opera "Neighbours." Besides acting, she has also worked as a singer, television presenter, and author. Her extensive career in the entertainment industry has made her a well-known figure in Australian television.

Emma Stone.info: Emma Stone is an acclaimed American actress known for her roles in numerous popular films. She was born Emily Jean Stone on November 6, 1988, in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA. As of October 2023, she is 34 years old. Stone gained prominence for her performances in movies such as "Superbad," "Easy A," "The Help," and "La La Land," the latter of which earned her an Academy Award for Best Actress. Her versatility and talent have made her one of Hollywood's leading actresses.

Anne Hathaway.info: Anne Hathaway is an acclaimed American actress, born on November 12, 1982, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 40 years old. Anne Hathaway gained prominence with her roles in films such as "The Princess Diaries," "Les Misérables," and "The Devil Wears Prada." Known for her versatile performances and captivating presence, she has established herself as one of Hollywood's leading actresses. Hathaway has also received numerous awards and nominations, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "Les Misérables."

John Cazale.info: John Cazale was an American actor born on August 12, 1935, in Revere, Massachusetts, USA. As of today's date in October 2023, John Cazale has passed away; he died on March 12, 1978, at the age of 42. Cazale was renowned for his work during the 1970s, though his film career was brief. He appeared in only five films, all of which were nominated for the Academy Award for Best Picture: "The Godfather" (1972), "The Conversation" (1974), "The Godfather Part II" (1974), "Dog Day Afternoon" (1975), and "The Deer Hunter" (1978). Despite his short career, Cazale's impact and legacy in the film industry remain significant, with a reputation for his talent and intense character portrayals.

Kramer.info: It seems like you are referring to the actor Michael Richards, who is best known for his role as Cosmo Kramer on the television show "Seinfeld." Michael Anthony Richards was born on July 24, 1949, in Culver City, California, USA. As of now, he is 74 years old. Richards gained significant fame and acclaim for his portrayal of the quirky and eccentric character Kramer, becoming a notable figure in American television during the show's run.

Viola Davis.info:
Viola Davis is an acclaimed American actress and producer, known for her powerful performances across film, television, and stage. She was born on August 11, 1965, in St. Matthews, South Carolina, United States. As of 2023, Viola Davis is 58 years old.

Davis has garnered critical acclaim for her roles in projects such as "The Help," "Fences," and the television series "How to Get Away with Murder." Her work has earned her numerous accolades, including Academy Awards, Emmy Awards, and Tony Awards, making her one of the few actors to achieve the Triple Crown of Acting. She is known for her dynamic range, deep authenticity, and the emotional depth she brings to her characters.

Julianne Moore.info: Julianne Moore is an acclaimed American actress, known for her roles in both independent films and major blockbusters. She was born on December 3, 1960, at Fort Bragg, North Carolina, USA. As of now, she is 62 years old. Over her career, Moore has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in "Still Alice" (2014), among other prestigious awards. Known for her versatility and emotional depth, she has appeared in films such as "Boogie Nights" (1997), "The Hours" (2002), and "Far from Heaven" (2002).

Amy Adams.info:
Amy Adams is an acclaimed American actress known for her roles in a variety of films spanning different genres. She was born on August 20, 1974, in Vicenza, Italy, as her father was stationed there with the U.S. Army. As of October 2023, Amy Adams is 49 years old.

Adams's career took off in the early 2000s when she garnered attention for her role in the film *Junebug* (2005), which earned her an Academy Award nomination. Since then, she has received several accolades and has been nominated for multiple Oscars, thanks to her diverse performances in films such as *Doubt* (2008), *The Fighter* (2010), *American Hustle* (2013), *Big Eyes* (2014), and *Vice* (2018). Known for her versatility and depth, Adams is considered one of the leading actresses of her generation.

Stanley Tucci.info:
Stanley Tucci is an American actor, producer, and author known for his versatile roles in film, television, and theater. He was born on November 11, 1960, in Peekskill, New York, USA. As of now, he is 62 years old.

Tucci has appeared in a wide range of films, from comedies to dramas, and is particularly noted for his performances in movies such as "The Devil Wears Prada," "Julie & Julia," "The Lovely Bones," and "The Hunger Games" series. In addition to his acting work, he has also directed and produced films and published a memoir about his experiences and love for food, reflecting his Italian heritage.

Bruce Willis.info: Bruce Willis is an American actor born on March 19, 1955, in Idar-Oberstein, West Germany. As of now, Bruce Willis is 68 years old. He is best known for his roles in the "Die Hard" series, where he played the iconic character John McClane, as well as movies like "Pulp Fiction," "The Sixth Sense," and "Moonlighting," where he first gained recognition. His career spans several decades, making him one of the most recognizable and enduring figures in the film industry.

Goldie Hawn.info: Goldie Hawn is an American actress, producer, and singer, known for her roles in films such as "Private Benjamin," "Overboard," and "The First Wives Club." She was born on November 21, 1945, in Washington, D.C., United States. As of 2023, Goldie Hawn is 77 years old. Her successful acting career has spanned several decades, and she is also known for being the mother of actress Kate Hudson. Hawn is not only celebrated for her comedic talent but also for her contributions to the film industry as a producer.

Lily Tomlin.info: Lily Tomlin is an acclaimed American actress, comedian, writer, and producer. She was born on September 1, 1939, in Detroit, Michigan, USA. As of 2023, Lily Tomlin is 84 years old. Tomlin has had a long and successful career spanning several decades, known for her work in television, film, and on stage. She gained early fame with her innovative comedy sketches on "Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In" in the late 1960s and early '70s. Tomlin has since delivered memorable performances in films such as "9 to 5," "Nashville," and "Grandma," and has been a part of the critically acclaimed Netflix series "Grace and Frankie" alongside Jane Fonda. Her work has earned her numerous awards and nominations, solidifying her status as a versatile and enduring figure in the entertainment industry.

Cher.info: Cher, whose full name is Cherilyn Sarkisian, is a renowned American singer, actress, and television personality. She was born on May 20, 1946, in El Centro, California, USA. As of 2023, Cher is 77 years old. Known for her distinctive contralto voice and for having adopted a variety of styles and appearances, she has long been referred to as the "Goddess of Pop." Cher gained fame in the 1960s as part of the husband-wife duo Sonny & Cher before launching a successful solo career. Her acting prowess has also been recognized in films such as "Moonstruck," for which she won an Academy Award.

Frances McDormand.info:
Frances McDormand is an acclaimed American actress known for her versatile performances in film, television, and theater. She was born on June 23, 1957, in Gibson City, Illinois, USA. As of October 2023, she is 66 years old.

McDormand has earned critical praise and numerous accolades throughout her career, including multiple Academy Awards. She is renowned for her roles in movies such as "Fargo," "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri," and "Nomadland," each of which garnered her an Oscar for Best Actress. Beyond her prolific film career, McDormand has also made notable appearances on stage and in several television projects, establishing herself as one of the most respected and talented actors in the industry.

Leonardo DiCaprio.info: Leonardo DiCaprio, an acclaimed American actor and producer, was born on November 11, 1974, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of today, he is 48 years old. Known for his versatility and profound performances in films, DiCaprio has garnered numerous awards, including an Academy Award, and is recognized for his roles in movies like "Titanic," "Inception," "The Wolf of Wall Street," and "The Revenant," among others. His career began in television before transitioning to film, where he earned a reputation as one of the most talented actors of his generation. DiCaprio is also known for his environmental activism, focusing on climate change and wildlife conservation.

Cate Blanchett.info: Cate Blanchett is an Australian actress known for her versatility and wide range of roles in film, television, and theater. She was born on May 14, 1969, in Ivanhoe, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. As of now, she is 54 years old. Blanchett has received numerous accolades throughout her career, including two Academy Awards, three Golden Globe Awards, and three BAFTA Awards. She is recognized for her performances in films such as "Elizabeth," "The Aviator," "Blue Jasmine," and "Carol," among many others.

Sandra Bullock.info: Sandra Annette Bullock is an acclaimed American actress and producer, born on July 26, 1964, in Arlington, Virginia, United States. As of now, she is 59 years old. Bullock gained widespread recognition for her roles in films such as "Speed," "Miss Congeniality," "The Blind Side," and "Gravity." Over the years, she has become one of Hollywood’s most beloved and successful actresses, known for her versatility in both comedic and dramatic roles. In addition to her acting career, Bullock has also been involved in production work and is known for her charitable activities.

Chris Cooper.info: Chris Cooper is an American actor known for his versatility and powerful performances across a wide range of film genres. He was born on July 9, 1951, in Kansas City, Missouri, USA. As of now, he is 72 years old. Cooper has had a distinguished career, featuring in notable films such as "American Beauty," "Adaptation" (for which he won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor), and "The Bourne Identity," among others. His ability to embody a variety of characters has earned him critical acclaim and a respected place in the film industry.

Robert Redford.info:
Robert Redford is an acclaimed American actor, director, and producer renowned for his contributions to the film industry over several decades. He was born on August 18, 1936, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of now, he is 87 years old.

Redford gained fame for his performances in classic films such as "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid," "The Sting," "All the President's Men," and "Out of Africa." Beyond acting, he is also recognized for founding the Sundance Film Festival, which has become a prominent platform for independent filmmakers. Over his career, he has received numerous awards and accolades, including an Academy Award for Lifetime Achievement.

Glenn Close.info: Glenn Close is an acclaimed American actress known for her work in film, television, and theater. She was born on March 19, 1947, in Greenwich, Connecticut, USA. As of now, she is 76 years old. Close's distinguished career spans several decades, during which she has earned numerous accolades, including multiple Academy Award nominations and wins in prestigious events like the Golden Globes, the Tony Awards, and the Primetime Emmy Awards. Some of her most notable film roles include performances in "Fatal Attraction," "Dangerous Liaisons," "101 Dalmatians," and "The Wife." Her versatility as an actress and her powerful presence have made her one of the most respected figures in the entertainment industry.

Clint Eastwood.info: Clint Eastwood is an iconic American actor, filmmaker, and cultural icon. He was born on May 31, 1930, in San Francisco, California, USA. As of now, he is 93 years old. Eastwood rose to fame with his role as the "Man with No Name" in Sergio Leone's "Dollars Trilogy" during the 1960s and gained further popularity portraying Harry Callahan in the "Dirty Harry" series throughout the 1970s and 1980s. Over his prolific career, he has become a highly acclaimed director and producer, winning multiple Academy Awards, including Best Director and Best Picture for films like "Unforgiven" and "Million Dollar Baby." In addition to his contributions to cinema, Eastwood has also been involved in music and politics, serving a term as mayor of Carmel-by-the-Sea, California, from 1986 to 1988.

Meg Ryan.info: Meg Ryan is an American actress and producer who was born on November 19, 1961, in Fairfield, Connecticut, USA. As of 2023, she is 61 years old. Ryan gained widespread recognition and popularity in the late 1980s and 1990s, particularly known for her roles in romantic comedies such as "When Harry Met Sally..." (1989), "Sleepless in Seattle" (1993), and "You've Got Mail" (1998). Her charming on-screen presence and talent made her one of the most prominent actresses of her time.

Robin Wright.info: Robin Wright is an American actress and director known for her versatile performances in both film and television. She was born on April 8, 1966, in Dallas, Texas, USA. As of 2023, she is 57 years old. Wright rose to fame with roles in movies such as "The Princess Bride" and "Forrest Gump," and later gained critical acclaim for her role as Claire Underwood in the television series "House of Cards." Besides acting, she has also ventured into directing, further showcasing her talent in the entertainment industry.

Sally Field.info: Sally Field is an American actress who was born on November 6, 1946, in Pasadena, California, USA. As of 2023, she is 76 years old. Field has had a long and successful career in the entertainment industry, known for her roles in both television and film. She gained fame in the 1960s with her television roles in shows like "Gidget" and "The Flying Nun" and later achieved critical acclaim for her performances in films such as "Norma Rae," for which she won an Academy Award for Best Actress, and "Places in the Heart," for which she received a second Oscar. Over the years, Sally Field has become a respected and iconic figure in Hollywood.

Halle Berry.info: Halle Berry is an American actress and former fashion model. She was born on August 14, 1966, in Cleveland, Ohio, USA. As of October 2023, she is 57 years old. Berry gained prominence in the early 1990s and has since become one of the most recognized and acclaimed actresses in Hollywood. She is known for her roles in films such as "Monster's Ball," for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress, making her the first African American woman to win this award. She has also starred in movies like "X-Men," "Swordfish," "Die Another Day," and "Gothika," showcasing her versatility and talent as an actress.

Bill Paxton.info:
Bill Paxton was an American actor and filmmaker, born on May 17, 1955, in Fort Worth, Texas, USA. He was renowned for his work in a wide variety of films and television series, often known for playing rugged and tough characters. Paxton appeared in blockbuster hits such as "Aliens," "Apollo 13," "Twister," and "Titanic." Additionally, he received critical acclaim for his role in the HBO series "Big Love," earning multiple Golden Globe nominations.

Unfortunately, Bill Paxton passed away on February 25, 2017, at the age of 61 due to complications following heart surgery. His death was a significant loss to the film industry, as he was a versatile and beloved figure both on and off the screen.

Gary Sinise.info: Gary Sinise is an American actor, director, and musician, best known for his role as Lieutenant Dan Taylor in the 1994 film "Forrest Gump," which earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor. He was born on March 17, 1955, in Blue Island, Illinois, USA. As of October 2023, Gary Sinise is 68 years old. In addition to his acting career, he is also recognized for his dedication to supporting veterans and military families, notably through the Gary Sinise Foundation.

Tim Allen.info:
Tim Allen, born Timothy Alan Dick, is an American actor and comedian well-known for his roles in television and film. He was born on June 13, 1953, in Denver, Colorado, USA. As of now, Tim Allen is 70 years old.

Allen gained prominence with his role as Tim "The Toolman" Taylor on the television sitcom "Home Improvement," which aired from 1991 to 1999. He is also notable for voicing the character Buzz Lightyear in the "Toy Story" film series and for starring as Scott Calvin/Santa Claus in "The Santa Clause" film series. Additionally, Allen starred in the television series "Last Man Standing," which aired from 2011 to 2021.

Audrey Tautou.info: Audrey Tautou is a French actress known for her work in both French and international films. She was born on August 9, 1976, in Beaumont, a commune in the Puy-de-Dôme department in Auvergne, central France. As of 2023, she is 47 years old. Tautou gained worldwide recognition with her role as the lead character in the critically acclaimed film "Amélie" (2001), which became a significant cultural phenomenon. Over the years, she has appeared in various successful films, including "The Da Vinci Code" (2006), "Priceless" (2006), and "A Very Long Engagement" (2004), showcasing her versatility as an actress.

Michael Clarke Duncan.info: Michael Clarke Duncan was an American actor best known for his breakout role as John Coffey in the 1999 film "The Green Mile," for which he received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor. He was born on December 10, 1957, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. Duncan started his career in various jobs, including as a bodyguard for celebrities, before transitioning into acting. Unfortunately, he passed away on September 3, 2012, at the age of 54. His commanding presence and deep voice made him memorable in Hollywood, and he left behind a legacy of performances in film and television.

David Morse.info: David Morse is an American actor, singer, and television director, known for his versatile roles in both film and television. He was born on October 11, 1953, in Beverly, Massachusetts, USA. As of now, he is 70 years old. Morse began his career in the 1970s and has since appeared in a wide range of projects, earning acclaim for his work in productions such as "The Green Mile," "12 Monkeys," and the television series "St. Elsewhere." Throughout his career, David Morse has been noted for his ability to embody diverse characters across various genres.

Geena Davis.info:
Geena Davis is an American actress and producer known for her work in both film and television. She was born on January 21, 1956, in Wareham, Massachusetts, USA. As of October 2023, she is 67 years old.

Geena Davis gained fame for her roles in various successful films such as "Thelma & Louise," "A League of Their Own," and "Beetlejuice." She has received several accolades throughout her career, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "The Accidental Tourist." Davis is also known for her advocacy work in promoting gender equality in the media and has founded the Geena Davis Institute on Gender in Media to address this issue.

Rosie O'Donnell.info: Rosie O'Donnell is an American comedian, actress, author, and television producer. She was born on March 21, 1962, in Commack, Long Island, New York, USA. As of now, she is 61 years old. O'Donnell gained prominence with her stand-up comedy and acting roles before becoming widely recognized as the host of her own talk show, "The Rosie O'Donnell Show," which aired from 1996 to 2002. John Goodman.info: John Goodman is an American actor known for his versatile roles in film, television, and theater. He was born on June 20, 1952, in Affton, Missouri, a suburb of St. Louis. Goodman has also been prominent in numerous successful films, including "The Big Lebowski," "Monsters, Inc.," "O Brother, Where Art Thou?," and "Argo." His distinctive voice and commanding presence have made him a respected and well-loved figure in the entertainment industry.

Jim Broadbent.info: Jim Broadbent is an accomplished English actor known for his work in film, television, and theatre. He was born on May 24, 1949, in Holton cum Beckering, a small village in Lincolnshire, England. As of now, he is 74 years old. Broadbent has received numerous accolades throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in "Iris" (2001), a BAFTA Award, and a Golden Globe. Catherine Zeta-Jones.info: Catherine Zeta-Jones is a celebrated actress born on September 25, 1969, in Swansea, Wales. As of now, she is 54 years old. Christopher Walken.info: Christopher Walken, born Ronald Walken, is a distinguished American actor renowned for his versatility and unique voice. Jude Law.info: Jude Law is an English actor born on December 29, 1972, in Lewisham, London, England. As of October 2023, he is 50 years old. Ewan McGregor.info:

Charlize Theron.info: Charlize Theron is a renowned actress and producer born on August 7, 1975, in Benoni, a city in the Gauteng Province of South Africa. As of 2023, she is 48 years old. Tim Robbins.info: Tim Robbins is an American actor, screenwriter, director, producer, and musician. He was born on October 16, 1958, in West Covina, California, USA. As of 2023, he is 65 years old. Mary Steenburgen.info: Mary Steenburgen is an American actress known for her work in film, television, and theater. She was born on February 8, 1953, in Newport, Arkansas, USA. Elijah Wood.info: Elijah Wood is an American actor and producer, best known for his portrayal of Frodo Baggins in the "Lord of the Rings" film trilogy. Seth Green.info: Seth Green is an American actor, producer, writer, and director known for his work across film and television. He was born on February 8, 1974, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. Hugh Grant.info: Hugh Grant is a British actor known for his roles in romantic comedies and dramas. He was born on September 9, 1960, in Hammersmith, London, England. Ben Affleck.info: Ben Affleck was born on August 15, 1972, in Berkeley, California, USA. As of October 2023, he is 51 years old. Gwyneth Paltrow.info: Gwyneth Paltrow is an acclaimed American actress, singer, and businesswoman known for her work in both film and television. Liam Neeson.info: Liam Neeson is a renowned actor born in Ballymena, County Antrim, Northern Ireland, on June 7, 1952. As of 2023, he is 71 years old. He gained international fame for his role in "Schindler's List" and has continued to captivate audiences with performances in movies like "Taken," "The Grey," and "Love Actually," among many others. Billy Crystal.info: Billy Crystal is an American actor, comedian, writer, producer, and film director. He was born on March 14, 1948, in Manhattan, New York City, New York. Liv Tyler.info: Liv Tyler is an American actress and former model, born on July 1, 1977, in New York City, New York, USA. As of October 2023, Liv Tyler is 46 years old. Harrison Ford.info: Harrison Ford is an acclaimed American actor known for his iconic roles in some of the highest-grossing films of all time. He was born on July 13, 1942, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. Tommy Lee Jones.info: Tommy Lee Jones is an American actor and film director, known for his distinctive voice and intense performances. He was born on September 15, 1946, in San Saba, Texas, USA. Matthew McConaughey.info: Matthew McConaughey is an American actor, known for his work in both dramatic and comedic roles. He was born on November 4, 1969, in Uvalde, Texas, USA. As of now, he is 53 years old. McConaughey gained widespread recognition for his role in "Dazed and Confused" and achieved critical acclaim with performances in films such as "Dallas Buyers Club," for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor. He is also known for his roles in movies like "Interstellar," "The Lincoln Lawyer," and the acclaimed TV series "True Detective." Anna Kendrick.info: Anna Kendrick is an American actress and singer, born on August 9, 1985, in Portland, Maine, USA. As of the current date in October 2023, she is 38 years old. Kendrick gained prominence for her role in the "Twilight Saga" film series and further established herself with a critically acclaimed performance in "Up in the Air" (2009), for which she received an Academy Award nomination. She is also well-known for starring in the "Pitch Perfect" film series. Kendrick's diverse career spans numerous genres, highlighting her versatile acting abilities and distinctive singing talent.

Malcolm McDowell.info:
Malcolm McDowell, born Malcolm John Taylor, is an acclaimed English actor known for his versatile and dynamic performances. He was born on June 13, 1943, in Horsforth, a suburb of Leeds, in West Yorkshire, England. As of October 2023, he is 80 years old.

McDowell rose to fame with his role as the rebellious Alex DeLarge in Stanley Kubrick's dystopian film "A Clockwork Orange" (1971), a performance that left a lasting impact and showcased his exceptional range as an actor. His career spans over several decades, with notable works in both film and television, including roles in "Caligula" (1979), "If...." (1968), and "O Lucky Man!" (1973). In addition to his film work, McDowell has participated in numerous television series and continued to work actively in the industry, contributing his talent to various projects around the world.

Antonio Banderas.info: Antonio Banderas is a renowned Spanish actor, director, and producer known for his work in both Spanish and Hollywood films. He was born on August 10, 1960, in Málaga, Andalusia, Spain. This places him at 63 years old as of 2023. Banderas gained international fame for his roles in movies like "The Mask of Zorro," "Desperado," "Evita," and "The 33," as well as for voicing Puss in Boots in the "Shrek" franchise and its spin-offs. Ben Kingsley.info: Ben Kingsley is a distinguished English actor born on December 31, 1943, in Snainton, North Riding of Yorkshire, England. As of now, he is 79 years old. Over the years, he has received numerous other accolades and has become one of the most respected actors in the industry.

Marion Cotillard.info: Marion Cotillard is a celebrated French actress known for her versatility and powerful performances in both French and English-language films. Jonah Hill.info: Jonah Hill is an American actor, producer, writer, and director known for his roles in comedy and drama films. He was born on December 20, 1983, in Los Angeles, California, USA. Shelley Duvall.info: Shelley Duvall is an American actress and producer known for her distinctive voice and versatile acting skills. She was born on July 7, 1949, in Fort Worth, Texas, USA. She also created and hosted the children's television series "Faerie Tale Theatre" in the 1980s. Faye Dunaway.info: Faye Dunaway is an acclaimed American actress known for her work in film, theater, and television. She was born on January 14, 1941, in Bascom, Florida, USA. Diane Keaton.info: Diane Keaton is an acclaimed American actress and filmmaker known for her versatile performances across a wide array of genres. Mark Wahlberg.info: Mark Wahlberg is an American actor, producer, and former rapper known for his versatile roles in both dramatic and comedic films. Jessica Lange.info: Jessica Lange is an acclaimed American actress known for her work in film, television, and theater. She was born on April 20, 1949, in Cloquet, Minnesota, United States. Michael Keaton.info: Michael Keaton, born Michael John Douglas on September 5, 1951, is an acclaimed actor known for his versatility in film and television. Michelle Pfeiffer.info: Michelle Pfeiffer is an acclaimed American actress known for her versatility and captivating performances across various film genres. Kathy Bates.info: Kathy Bates is an acclaimed American actress and director known for her versatile performances in film, television, and theater. She has also been recognized for her work in movies such as "Fried Green Tomatoes," "Dolores Claiborne," and "Titanic," as well as television shows like "American Horror Story" and "Harry's Law." Vera Farmiga.info: Vera Farmiga is an accomplished American actress and director, known for her versatile roles in both film and television. She was born on August 6, 1973, in Clifton, New Jersey, USA. As of 2023, Vera Farmiga is 50 years old. Farmiga has made significant contributions to the entertainment industry, both in front of the camera and behind it.

Louise Fletcher.info:

Fletcher had a successful career in both film and television, appearing in a wide range of projects throughout her career. Despite her acclaim for "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest," she managed to create a diverse resume, including performances in movies like "Exorcist II: The Heretic" and television series such as "Star Trek: Deep Space Nine," where she played the character Kai Winn Adami.

Louise Fletcher passed away on September 23, 2022, at the age of 88.

Christopher Lloyd.info: Christopher Lloyd is an American actor born on October 22, 1938, in Stamford, Connecticut, USA. As of October 2023, he is 84 years old. Veronica Cartwright.info: Veronica Cartwright is a British-American actress born on April 20, 1949, in Bristol, England. As of 2023, she is 74 years old. Patrick Swayze.info:

Molly Ringwald.info:

Robert Downey Jr..info: Robert Downey Jr. is an acclaimed American actor and producer, known for his diverse roles and incredible career resurgence. Michael Douglas.info: Michael Douglas is an American actor and producer known for his versatile roles in film and television. He was born on September 25, 1944, in New Brunswick, New Jersey, USA. Rob Lowe.info: Rob Lowe is an American actor born on March 17, 1964, in Charlottesville, Virginia, USA. As of now, he is 59 years old. He is known for roles in movies like "The Outsiders" and "St. Elmo's Fire," as well as television series such as "The West Wing" and "Parks and Recreation."

Andrew McCarthy.info: Andrew McCarthy is an American actor, travel writer, and television director. He was born on November 29, 1962, in Westfield, New Jersey, USA. As of now, he is 60 years old. Some of his notable films from that era include "St. Elmo's Fire," "Pretty in Pink," and "Less Than Zero." Besides his acting career, McCarthy has also made a name for himself as a travel writer and a director, contributing to various publications and working on several television series.

Ally Sheedy.info: Ally Sheedy is an American actress and author, best known for her roles in seminal 1980s films. She was born on June 13, 1962, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Ally Sheedy is 61 years old. She gained significant recognition for her performances in films such as "The Breakfast Club" and "St. Elmo's Fire," which helped establish her as a prominent figure in the "Brat Pack," a group of young actors who rose to fame during that decade. Beyond her film career, Sheedy has also appeared in theater productions and on television. Additionally, she is a published author, having written books including young adult novels.

Charlie Sheen.info: Charlie Sheen, whose birth name is Carlos Irwin Estévez, was born on September 3, 1965, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Charlie Sheen is 58 years old. He is well-known for his roles in films such as "Platoon" and "Wall Street," and for his television work in series like "Two and a Half Men" and "Spin City." Sheen is the son of actor Martin Sheen and the brother of actors Emilio Estevez, Ramon Estevez, and Renée Estevez.

David Duchovny.info: David Duchovny is an American actor, writer, producer, director, novelist, and singer-songwriter. He was born on August 7, 1960, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, David Duchovny is 63 years old. He is best known for his work as FBI agent Fox Mulder on the television series "The X-Files," as well as his role as Hank Moody on the series "Californication." Besides acting, Duchovny has also published several novels and embarked on a music career.

Glenne Headly.info:
Glenne Headly was an American actress born on March 13, 1955, in New London, Connecticut, USA. She had a diverse career, both on stage and in film, earning acclaim for her versatility and talent. Headly gained recognition for her roles in films such as "Dirty Rotten Scoundrels," "Dick Tracy," and "Mortal Thoughts." Additionally, she was a founding member of the renowned Steppenwolf Theatre Company based in Chicago.

Tragically, Glenne Headly passed away on June 8, 2017, at the age of 62, in Santa Monica, California. Her contributions to the performing arts have left a lasting legacy, and she is remembered for her dynamic acting abilities and memorable performances.

Shirley MacLaine.info: Shirley MacLaine is an acclaimed American actress, singer, and dancer, known for her versatile performances in film, television, and on stage. She was born on April 24, 1934, in Richmond, Virginia, USA. As of October 2023, Shirley MacLaine is 89 years old. Renowned for her roles in classic films such as "The Apartment," "Terms of Endearment," and "Steel Magnolias," MacLaine has earned numerous accolades throughout her career, including an Academy Award for Best Actress and multiple Golden Globe Awards. In addition to her acting career, she is also known for her interest in spirituality and metaphysics, about which she has written several books.

Billy Bob Thornton.info: Billy Bob Thornton is an American actor, filmmaker, and musician. He was born on August 4, 1955, in Hot Springs, Arkansas, USA. As of now, in 2023, he is 68 years old. Thornton has had a prolific career in the entertainment industry, with notable roles in films such as "Sling Blade," which he also wrote and directed, earning him an Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay. Besides his acting career, he is known for his work in music and his distinctive Southern accent and persona.

Will Smith.info:
Will Smith is a renowned American actor, producer, and musician, known for his charismatic personality and versatility across various genres in film and television. He was born on September 25, 1968, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States. As of 2023, he is 55 years old.

Will Smith initially gained fame as a rapper under the name "The Fresh Prince" before transitioning to acting. He became a household name with the NBC television series "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air," which aired from 1990 to 1996. His successful career in Hollywood includes leading roles in blockbuster films such as "Independence Day," "Men in Black," "Ali," "The Pursuit of Happyness," and "Bad Boys," among many others. Beyond acting, Will Smith is also an accomplished producer and has explored various business ventures.

Annette Bening.info: Annette Bening is an acclaimed American actress known for her versatile performances in film, television, and theater. She was born on May 29, 1958, in Topeka, Kansas, USA. As of October 2023, Annette Bening is 65 years old. Throughout her career, she has received several accolades, including nominations for Academy Awards and Golden Globes, for her roles in movies such as "American Beauty," "The Kids Are All Right," "Being Julia," and "The Grifters." Bening's contribution to the arts has made her a respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Benicio del Toro.info: Benicio del Toro is a Puerto Rican actor known for his intense performances and versatility in a variety of film genres. He was born on February 19, 1967, in San Germán, Puerto Rico. As of October 2023, he is 56 years old. Del Toro has earned critical acclaim and numerous awards throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in "Traffic" (2000). His other notable films include "The Usual Suspects" (1995), "21 Grams" (2003), "Che" (2008), and his role as the Collector in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Sharon Stone.info: Sharon Stone is an American actress, producer, and former fashion model. She was born on March 10, 1958, in Meadville, Pennsylvania, USA. As of 2023, she is 65 years old. Sharon Stone rose to international fame for her role in the film "Basic Instinct" (1992) and has received critical acclaim for her work in various other films and television series. Over the years, she has been recognized for her versatility and strength as an actress, earning numerous awards and nominations, including an Academy Award nomination, a Golden Globe Award, and an Emmy Award.

Teri Hatcher.info: Teri Hatcher is an American actress known for her work in television and film. She was born on December 8, 1964, in Palo Alto, California, USA. As of October 2023, she is 58 years old. Hatcher gained widespread recognition for her role as Lois Lane in the television series "Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman" and later as Susan Mayer on the hit TV show "Desperate Housewives," for which she won a Golden Globe Award. In addition to her television work, she has appeared in various films and continues to be a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Jamie Lee Curtis.info: Jamie Lee Curtis is an acclaimed American actress, author, and activist. She was born on November 22, 1958, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of 2023, she is 64 years old. Curtis comes from a family with a strong show business lineage; she is the daughter of legendary actors Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh. She gained prominence for her role in the iconic horror film "Halloween" as Laurie Strode and has since built a diverse and successful career in films and television. In addition to her acting career, Curtis is a bestselling author and a prominent advocate for various social causes.

Joan Cusack.info: Joan Cusack is an American actress known for her versatile roles in both film and television. She was born on October 11, 1962, in New York City, New York, but was raised in Chicago, Illinois. As of 2023, Joan Cusack is 61 years old. She is known for her work in movies such as "Working Girl," "In & Out," and the "Toy Story" series, where she voices the character Jessie. Joan is part of a well-known acting family, including her brother, actor John Cusack.

Lloyd Bridges.info:
Lloyd Bridges was an American actor born on January 15, 1913, in San Leandro, California, USA. He had a prolific career in film and television, spanning several decades. Bridges became widely known for his work in various genres, including adventure, drama, and comedy. He achieved great popularity for his role in the television series "Sea Hunt," which aired from 1958 to 1961.

Lloyd Bridges passed away on March 10, 1998, at the age of 85, in Los Angeles, California. He left behind a significant legacy in the entertainment industry and was the father of actors Jeff Bridges and Beau Bridges, both of whom also achieved notable success in Hollywood.

Kurt Russell.info:
Kurt Russell is an American actor known for his diverse roles in film and television. He was born on March 17, 1951, in Springfield, Massachusetts, USA. As of 2023, Kurt Russell is 72 years old.

Russell began his acting career as a child, appearing on television shows and eventually moving into films. He gained recognition for his roles in various genres, including action, comedy, and drama. Some of his notable films include "Escape from New York," "Big Trouble in Little China," "The Thing," and "Tombstone." Over the years, he has become known for his collaborations with director John Carpenter and for his charismatic on-screen presence.

In addition to his successful career, Kurt Russell is known for his long-term relationship with actress Goldie Hawn. The couple has been together since 1983 and is known for being one of Hollywood's enduring pairs.

Anthony Hopkins.info: Sir Anthony Hopkins is a renowned Welsh actor, born on December 31, 1937, in Margam, Port Talbot, Wales. As of now, he is 85 years old. Hopkins has had an illustrious career in film, television, and theater and is best known for his role as Dr. Hannibal Lecter in "The Silence of the Lambs," for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor. His remarkable talent and versatility have made him one of the most respected and celebrated actors in the industry.

Natalie Portman.info:
Natalie Portman is an acclaimed actress and director, known for her versatile roles in film and her contributions to the arts. She was born on June 9, 1981, in Jerusalem, Israel. As of October 2023, she is 42 years old.

Portman holds a dual Israeli and American citizenship and moved to the United States with her family at a young age. She began her acting career in the mid-1990s and gained widespread recognition for her role as Padmé Amidala in the "Star Wars" prequel trilogy. She is also known for her performances in films such as "Black Swan," for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress, "V for Vendetta," "Closer," and "Jackie."

Apart from acting, Portman has also directed and produced several films, showcasing her talents beyond acting. She is known for her intellectual rigor, holding a degree in psychology from Harvard University, and has been actively involved in humanitarian causes and environmental advocacy.

Uma Thurman.info: Uma Thurman is an American actress and model, born on April 29, 1970, in Boston, Massachusetts, United States. As of now, she is 53 years old. Thurman is renowned for her roles in a variety of films ranging from dramas to science fiction and action movies. She gained significant recognition for her work with director Quentin Tarantino in films such as "Pulp Fiction" (1994) and the "Kill Bill" series (2003-2004). Thurman's acting career spans several decades, and she has been praised for her versatility and strong presence on screen.

Tom Hardy.info: Tom Hardy is a renowned British actor known for his versatile performances across various film genres. He was born on September 15, 1977, in Hammersmith, London, England. As of October 2023, Tom Hardy is 46 years old. He has gained critical acclaim for his roles in films such as "Inception," "The Dark Knight Rises," "Mad Max: Fury Road," and "Venom." He is also recognized for his work in television, including the series "Peaky Blinders" and "Taboo." Hardy's intense and often transformative performances have made him one of the leading actors of his generation.

Daniel Radcliffe.info: Daniel Radcliffe is a British actor who was born on July 23, 1989, in Fulham, London, England. As of October 2023, he is 34 years old. Radcliffe is best known for his role as Harry Potter in the film adaptations of J.K. Rowling's popular book series. He began his acting career at a young age and experienced massive success and global recognition through the "Harry Potter" franchise, which spanned from 2001 to 2011. Beyond "Harry Potter," Radcliffe has taken on diverse roles in film, television, and theater, showcasing his versatility as an actor.

Judi Dench.info: Judi Dench is a renowned English actress known for her extensive work in film, television, and theatre. She was born on December 9, 1934, in York, England, United Kingdom. As of 2023, she is 88 years old. Dench has had a distinguished career spanning several decades and is celebrated for her versatile performances and contributions to the arts. She has received numerous awards and honors, including an Academy Award, several British Academy Film Awards, and a Tony Award, among others. Dench is particularly revered for her roles in both classical and contemporary productions, including her performances as M in the James Bond film series and in stage productions of Shakespearean plays.

Helena Bonham Carter.info: Helena Bonham Carter is a British actress known for her diverse roles in both independent and mainstream films. She was born on May 26, 1966, in Islington, London, England. As of 2023, she is 57 years old. Bonham Carter has built a reputation for her performances in period dramas as well as unique characters in films directed by Tim Burton, with whom she has frequently collaborated. Some of her notable works include roles in "A Room with a View," "The King's Speech," and "Fight Club," as well as portraying Bellatrix Lestrange in the "Harry Potter" film series.

Tom Waits.info:
Tom Waits is a renowned American singer-songwriter, musician, composer, and actor known for his distinctive voice and eclectic mix of musical styles, including jazz, blues, and rock. He was born on December 7, 1949, in Pomona, California, USA.

As of today, Tom Waits is 73 years old. Over his career, Waits has been recognized not only for his music but also for his contributions to film. His acting credits include roles in movies such as "Down by Law" (1986), "Bram Stoker's Dracula" (1992), and "The Ballad of Buster Scruggs" (2018), among others. He is celebrated for his unique voice and theatrical persona, which have influenced a wide array of artists across multiple genres.

Chris Hemsworth.info: Chris Hemsworth is an Australian actor born on August 11, 1983, in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. As of now, he is 40 years old. Hemsworth is best known for his role as Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, among other film and television appearances. He has become a well-known figure in the entertainment industry, not only for his action roles but also for his versatility as an actor.

Tilda Swinton.info: Tilda Swinton is a renowned British actress known for her versatility and unique presence on screen. She was born on November 5, 1960, in London, England. Swinton has gained recognition for her roles in both independent and mainstream films, often collaborating with notable directors such as Derek Jarman, Wes Anderson, and the Coen brothers. As of now, she is 62 years old. Her career spans several decades, and she has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the film "Michael Clayton" (2007). Swinton is celebrated for her distinctive androgynous style and her ability to portray a wide range of characters.

Johnny Depp.info: Johnny Depp is an American actor, producer, and musician, born on June 9, 1963, in Owensboro, Kentucky, USA. As of 2023, he is 60 years old. Depp has had a prolific career in Hollywood, known for his versatile roles and collaborations with director Tim Burton. Some of his most notable films include "Edward Scissorhands," "Pirates of the Caribbean," and "Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street." Over the years, Depp has become one of the most iconic and influential actors of his generation.

Scarlett Johansson.info: Scarlett Johansson was born on November 22, 1984, in Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA. As of now, she is 38 years old. Johansson is a highly acclaimed actress known for her roles in films such as "Lost in Translation," "The Avengers," and "Marriage Story." She has received numerous accolades for her work, including nominations for multiple Academy Awards. Scarlett Johansson is also one of the highest-grossing actresses of all time, largely due to her role as Natasha Romanoff (Black Widow) in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Benedict Cumberbatch.info: Benedict Cumberbatch is a British actor known for his versatility and distinctive voice. He was born on July 19, 1976, in London, England. As of the current year, 2023, he is 47 years old. Cumberbatch gained international recognition for his role as Sherlock Holmes in the television series "Sherlock" and has appeared in a wide range of films, including "The Imitation Game," "Doctor Strange," and "The Power of the Dog," among many others. His performances have earned him numerous awards and nominations, making him a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Ryan Gosling.info: Ryan Gosling is a Canadian actor and musician born on November 12, 1980, in London, Ontario, Canada. As of October 2023, he is 42 years old. Gosling gained fame for his roles in films such as "The Notebook," "La La Land," "Drive," and "Blade Runner 2049." Over the years, he has been celebrated for his versatility and depth in acting, leading to various award nominations and wins. Additionally, Gosling has ventured into music, forming the band Dead Man's Bones with Zach Shields.

Angelina Jolie.info: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She was born on June 4, 1975, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of the current date in 2023, she is 48 years old. Jolie has received numerous accolades throughout her career, including an Academy Award and three Golden Globe Awards, and is known for her roles in movies such as "Lara Croft: Tomb Raider," "Mr. & Mrs. Smith," "Maleficent," and "The Changeling." In addition to her acting career, she is also well-known for her humanitarian efforts, particularly her work with the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR).

Michael Caine.info: Michael Caine is a renowned English actor known for his distinctive voice and versatile performances across a wide range of films. He was born on March 14, 1933, in Rotherhithe, London, England. As of the last update in October 2023, Michael Caine is 90 years old. Throughout his illustrious career, he has received numerous awards and nominations, including two Academy Awards for Best Supporting Actor for his roles in "Hannah and Her Sisters" (1986) and "The Cider House Rules" (1999). Caine's contribution to the film industry has made him a beloved figure worldwide.

Jared Leto.info: Jared Leto is an American actor and musician, known for his versatility and transformative performances. He was born on December 26, 1971, in Bossier City, Louisiana, USA. As of now, he is 51 years old. Throughout his career, Leto has gained critical acclaim for his roles in films such as "Requiem for a Dream," "Dallas Buyers Club" (for which he won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor), and "Suicide Squad." In addition to his acting career, Jared Leto is also the lead vocalist and guitarist for the band Thirty Seconds to Mars. His passion for the arts and dedication to his craft have made him a prominent figure in both the film and music industries.

Mila Kunis.info: Mila Kunis is an American actress born on August 14, 1983, in Chernivtsi, Ukrainian SSR, in the Soviet Union (present-day Ukraine). As of October 2023, she is 40 years old. Mila immigrated to the United States with her family in 1991, settling in Los Angeles, California. She began her acting career at a young age and gained widespread recognition for her role as Jackie Burkhart on the television series "That '70s Show." Kunis has also appeared in numerous films, including "Forgetting Sarah Marshall," "Black Swan," "Friends with Benefits," and "Bad Moms." Her engaging screen presence and versatile acting talents have earned her critical acclaim and a significant fan following worldwide.

Emile Hirsch.info: Emile Hirsch is an American actor born on March 13, 1985, in Topanga, California, United States. As of 2023, Emile Hirsch is 38 years old. He is known for his roles in films such as "Into the Wild," "Milk," "The Girl Next Door," and "Lone Survivor." Hirsch began his acting career in the late 1990s with appearances in television series before transitioning to film, earning accolades for his diverse and compelling performances over the years.

Josh Brolin.info: Josh Brolin is an American actor born on February 12, 1968, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of 2023, he is 55 years old. Brolin is known for his diverse roles in film and television, having gained significant recognition for his performances in movies like "No Country for Old Men," "True Grit," and as the iconic villain Thanos in the Marvel Cinematic Universe's "Avengers" series. He comes from a family with a background in the entertainment industry, as his father, James Brolin, is also an accomplished actor. Throughout his career, Josh Brolin has demonstrated a wide range of acting abilities, making him a prominent figure in Hollywood.

James Franco.info: James Franco is an American actor, filmmaker, and academic. He was born on April 19, 1978, in Palo Alto, California, USA. As of 2023, he is 45 years old. Franco is best known for his roles in films such as "127 Hours," for which he received an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor, as well as the "Spider-Man" trilogy, "Pineapple Express," and "The Disaster Artist," among others. In addition to his acting career, Franco has directed several films and is also known for his involvement in academia, having taught film and writing at various institutions.

Naomi Watts.info: Naomi Watts is a British-born actress who has gained prominence and acclaim in Hollywood. She was born on September 28, 1968, in Shoreham, Kent, England. As of 2023, Naomi Watts is 55 years old. Her career has been marked by versatile roles in a variety of genres, from horror and drama to comedy and thrillers. She rose to fame with her performances in films such as "Mulholland Drive," "The Ring," and "21 Grams," the latter of which earned her an Academy Award nomination.

Benicio Del Toro.info: Benicio Del Toro is a well-known actor born on February 19, 1967, in San Germán, Puerto Rico. As of now, he is 56 years old. Del Toro has had an illustrious career in the film industry, recognized for his versatile performances in a wide range of roles across various genres. Some of his most notable films include "The Usual Suspects," "Traffic," for which he won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor, "21 Grams," "Sicario," and "Che." Del Toro is celebrated for his intense and compelling acting style, making him one of Hollywood's most respected actors.

Kevin Spacey.info: Kevin Spacey is an American actor and producer, known for his work in film, television, and theater. He was born on July 26, 1959, in South Orange, New Jersey, USA. As of now, he is 64 years old. Spacey gained prominence for his versatile roles in films such as "American Beauty" and "The Usual Suspects," and he also starred in the popular television series "House of Cards." Throughout his career, he has received numerous awards, including two Academy Awards and a Tony Award, highlighting his impact on the entertainment industry.

Susan Sarandon.info: Susan Sarandon is a renowned American actress and activist, born on October 4, 1946, in Queens, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 77 years old. Sarandon has had a prolific career in film and television, known for her versatile roles and strong performances. Some of her most acclaimed works include "Thelma & Louise," "Dead Man Walking," for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress, and "Bull Durham." In addition to her acting career, Sarandon is also known for her humanitarian efforts and involvement in various social and political causes.

George Clooney.info: George Clooney is an acclaimed American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter known for his versatile roles in both television and film. He was born on May 6, 1961, in Lexington, Kentucky, USA. As of October 2023, George Clooney is 62 years old. Clooney has received numerous awards throughout his career, including two Academy Awards and four Golden Globe Awards. He first gained fame for his role as Dr. Doug Ross on the medical drama "ER" and subsequently became one of Hollywood's leading men with roles in films such as "Ocean's Eleven," "Michael Clayton," and "Up in the Air." In addition to his acting career, Clooney is also recognized for his humanitarian efforts and political activism.

Javier Bardem.info:
Javier Bardem is a renowned Spanish actor known for his versatile roles in both Spanish and international films. He was born on March 1, 1969, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, in the Canary Islands, Spain. As of now, he is 54 years old.

Bardem comes from a family with deep roots in the film industry, which includes his mother, Pilar Bardem, and his uncle, director Juan Antonio Bardem. He gained significant acclaim and recognition for his role in the Coen brothers’ film "No Country for Old Men," for which he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. Over the years, Javier Bardem has built an impressive career, characterized by powerful performances and a strong presence on screen.

Idris Elba.info: Idris Elba is a British actor, producer, musician, and DJ, known for his versatile performances across film, television, and music. He was born on September 6, 1972, in London, England, specifically in the Borough of Hackney. As of 2023, he is 51 years old. Elba has gained critical acclaim for his roles in projects such as "Luther," "The Wire," and films like "Beasts of No Nation" and the "Thor" series. In addition to his acting career, he has pursued music under the DJ moniker DJ Big Driis and has been involved in various charitable endeavors.

Robin Williams.info:
Robin Williams was an American actor and comedian, beloved for his versatility and energetic performances. He was born on July 21, 1951, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. Known for his roles in films such as "Good Morning, Vietnam," "Dead Poets Society," "Mrs. Doubtfire," and "Good Will Hunting," Williams had an illustrious career that spanned over four decades. 

Sadly, Robin Williams passed away on August 11, 2014, at the age of 63. His legacy, however, continues to resonate through the myriad of memorable characters he portrayed and the impact he had on both the entertainment industry and his many fans worldwide.

Adrien Brody.info:
Adrien Brody is an American actor known for his versatile roles in both independent films and major productions. He was born on April 14, 1973, in Woodhaven, Queens, New York City, New York, United States. As of October 2023, Adrien Brody is 50 years old.

Brody achieved significant acclaim and international recognition for his role as Władysław Szpilman in Roman Polanski's film "The Pianist" (2002), for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor. At 29, he was the youngest actor to win the Oscar in that category. Over the years, he has appeared in a variety of films, showcasing his range as an actor, including "The Grand Budapest Hotel" (2014), "King Kong" (2005), "The Thin Red Line" (1998), and "Midnight in Paris" (2011).

Oprah Winfrey.info: Oprah Winfrey is an American talk show host, television producer, actress, author, and philanthropist. She was born on January 29, 1954, in Kosciusko, Mississippi, USA. As of the current date, she is 69 years old. Winfrey is best known for her talk show, "The Oprah Winfrey Show," which ran in national syndication for 25 years, from 1986 to 2011. She has also been involved in numerous other media and philanthropic endeavors and is often referred to as the "Queen of All Media." Her influence extends beyond television through her book club, O Magazine, and her own television network, OWN.

Harvey Keitel.info:
Harvey Keitel is an American actor known for his intense and versatile performances in both film and television. He was born on May 13, 1939, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Harvey Keitel is 84 years old.

Keitel has had a distinguished career spanning several decades, marked by collaborations with famed directors like Martin Scorsese and Quentin Tarantino. Some of his most notable film roles include appearances in "Mean Streets" (1973), "Taxi Driver" (1976), "Reservoir Dogs" (1992), and "Pulp Fiction" (1994). His work has garnered him critical acclaim and a reputation as one of the most esteemed actors in the industry.

David Strathairn.info: David Strathairn is an American actor known for his versatile roles in film, television, and theater. He was born on January 26, 1949, in San Francisco, California, USA. As of 2023, David Strathairn is 74 years old. Over his long career, he has garnered acclaim for his performances in a variety of genres, from dramas to science fiction, and is particularly renowned for his role in the film "Good Night, and Good Luck," which earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor.

Whitney Houston.info:
Whitney Houston was an iconic American singer, actress, and model, widely regarded as one of the greatest vocalists in the history of popular music. She was born on August 9, 1963, in Newark, New Jersey, USA.

Houston's impressive vocal skills and powerful performances propelled her to immense popularity in the 1980s and 1990s. She made her acting debut in films like "The Bodyguard" (1992), "Waiting to Exhale" (1995), and "The Preacher's Wife" (1996), expanding her career beyond music. Sadly, Whitney Houston passed away on February 11, 2012, at the age of 48. Her legacy continues to influence artists and entertain audiences worldwide.

Stockard Channing.info:
Stockard Channing is an acclaimed American actress known for her roles in both film and television. She was born on February 13, 1944, in New York City, New York, United States. As of now, she is 79 years old.

Channing is perhaps best known for her portrayal of Betty Rizzo in the 1978 film "Grease" and for her role as First Lady Abbey Bartlet on the television series "The West Wing." Over the years, she has earned critical acclaim, including several Emmy Awards and a Tony Award, showcasing her versatility and talent across different entertainment mediums.

Sanaa Lathan.info: Sanaa Lathan is an accomplished American actress. She was born on September 19, 1971, in New York City, New York, United States. As of October 2023, Sanaa Lathan is 52 years old. Over the course of her career, she has gained recognition for her roles in films such as "Love & Basketball," "Alien vs. Predator," and "The Best Man" series. Additionally, Lathan has also been involved in television, lending her talent to various series and made guest appearances on numerous productions. She is esteemed for her versatile acting skills and has earned several award nominations and wins throughout her career.

Arnold Schwarzenegger.info:
Arnold Schwarzenegger is an Austrian-American actor, producer, and former professional bodybuilder. He was born on July 30, 1947, in Thal, Styria, Austria. As of 2023, he is 76 years old.

Arnold gained international fame as a leading actor in Hollywood action films, most notably for his role as the titular character in the "Terminator" series. Before becoming a film star, he was a successful bodybuilder, winning the prestigious Mr. Olympia contest multiple times. Beyond his acting career, Arnold Schwarzenegger also served as the 38th governor of California from 2003 to 2011.

Throughout his life, he has been recognized for his contributions to the film industry, bodybuilding, and politics, making him a prominent figure across multiple fields.

Justin Timberlake.info: Justin Timberlake is an American singer, songwriter, producer, and actor known for his dynamic career in both the music and film industries. He was born on January 31, 1981, in Memphis, Tennessee, USA. As of 2023, Justin Timberlake is 42 years old. Timberlake first gained prominence as a member of the popular boy band *NSYNC in the late 1990s and early 2000s before establishing a successful solo music career. In addition to his musical achievements, Timberlake has also acted in several films, including roles in movies such as "The Social Network," "Friends with Benefits," and "Inside Llewyn Davis."

Vanessa Redgrave.info: Vanessa Redgrave is a renowned English actress known for her versatility and extensive career in film, television, and theatre. She was born on January 30, 1937, in Greenwich, London, England. As of October 2023, Vanessa Redgrave is 86 years old. She comes from a distinguished acting family; her father was the celebrated actor Sir Michael Redgrave, and her mother was actress Rachel Kempson. Over the years, Vanessa Redgrave has been acclaimed for her performances in works such as "Julia," "Howards End," and "The Bostonians," and she continues to be a prominent figure in the acting world.

Patrick Stewart.info: Sir Patrick Stewart is an esteemed English actor, renowned for his work in theater, television, and film. He was born on July 13, 1940, in Mirfield, West Yorkshire, England. As of now, he is 83 years old. Patrick Stewart is widely recognized for his roles such as Captain Jean-Luc Picard in the "Star Trek: The Next Generation" series and films, as well as Professor Charles Xavier in the "X-Men" film series. His impressive career spans decades, and he has earned acclaim for both his classical and contemporary roles.

Geoffrey Rush.info: Geoffrey Rush is an Australian actor known for his diverse range of roles in both film and theater. He was born on July 6, 1951, in Toowoomba, Queensland, Australia. As of the moment, he is 72 years old. Rush has received critical acclaim for his performances and has won numerous awards, including an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in "Shine" (1996), and has been involved in various successful productions, both in his home country and internationally. His career spans decades, with notable performances in films such as "Pirates of the Caribbean" series, "The King’s Speech," and "The Book Thief."

Minnie Driver.info: Minnie Driver is a British-American actress and singer-songwriter. She was born on January 31, 1970, in London, England. As of October 2023, Minnie Driver is 53 years old. She gained significant recognition for her role in the film "Good Will Hunting" (1997), for which she received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress. In addition to her acting career, Driver has released music albums and remains active in both the film and television industries.

Zac Efron.info: Zac Efron is an American actor born on October 18, 1987, in San Luis Obispo, California, USA. As of now, he is 35 years old. Efron gained fame for his role as Troy Bolton in the "High School Musical" franchise and has since expanded his career to include a variety of film genres, including comedies like "Neighbors" and dramas such as "The Greatest Showman." Over the years, he has become well-known for his versatility and charisma on screen.

Amanda Seyfried.info: Amanda Seyfried is an American actress known for her roles in film, television, and theater. She was born on December 3, 1985, in Allentown, Pennsylvania, USA. As of now, she is 37 years old. Seyfried began her career as a model before transitioning to acting, gaining initial fame for her portrayal of Karen Smith in the 2004 comedy "Mean Girls." She has since been recognized for her performances in movies such as "Mamma Mia!" and its sequel, "Les Misérables," and the critically acclaimed TV series "Big Love" and "The Dropout." Seyfried's versatility and talent have earned her a significant place in contemporary American cinema.

Liam Hemsworth.info: Liam Hemsworth is an Australian actor, born on January 13, 1990, in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. As of now, he is 33 years old. Liam is best known for his roles in films such as "The Hunger Games" series, where he played Gale Hawthorne, and romantic dramas like "The Last Song." Having grown up in a family involved in the arts, with older brothers Chris and Luke Hemsworth also being actors, Liam began his career in Australian television before making a successful transition to Hollywood.

Chris Evans.info: Chris Evans is an American actor born on June 13, 1981, in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. As of 2023, he is 42 years old. Evans is best known for his role as Steve Rogers, also known as Captain America, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Throughout his career, he has gained recognition not only for his performances in superhero films but also for his roles in a variety of other genres including comedies, dramas, and science fiction.

Naomie Harris.info: Naomie Harris is a British actress born on September 6, 1976, in London, England. As of 2023, she is 47 years old. Harris is known for her versatile acting skills and has appeared in a variety of film and television roles. She gained widespread recognition for her performances in films such as "28 Days Later," "Pirates of the Caribbean" series, and the James Bond films "Skyfall," "Spectre," and "No Time to Die," in which she plays the character Moneypenny. Harris also received critical acclaim for her role in the film "Moonlight," for which she earned several award nominations, including an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress. She is celebrated for her ability to take on diverse and challenging roles, contributing significantly to the film industry.

Mickey Rourke.info: Mickey Rourke is an American actor and former professional boxer known for his performances in a wide range of dramatic films. He was born Philip Andre Rourke Jr. on September 16, 1952, in Schenectady, New York, USA. As of 2023, he is 71 years old. Rourke gained critical acclaim in the 1980s with films such as "Diner," "Rumble Fish," and "9½ Weeks." He later made a successful comeback in the late 2000s with "The Wrestler," for which he received a Golden Globe Award and an Academy Award nomination. In addition to his acting career, Rourke pursued professional boxing in the 1990s, which significantly impacted his physical appearance and acting path.

Linda Fiorentino.info: Linda Fiorentino is an American actress who was born on March 9, 1958, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She is known for her roles in films such as "The Last Seduction" (1994) and "Men in Black" (1997). As of 2023, Linda Fiorentino is 65 years old. Fiorentino has had a successful career in Hollywood, often noted for her enigmatic and intense performances.

Daryl Hannah.info: Daryl Hannah is an American actress born on December 3, 1960, in Chicago, Illinois. As of now, she is 62 years old. She gained fame in the 1980s with iconic roles in films such as "Blade Runner" (1982), where she played the role of Pris, and "Splash" (1984), where she starred as a mermaid opposite Tom Hanks. Known for her distinctive beauty and strong presence on screen, Hannah has continued to work in various film and television projects over the decades. Apart from her acting career, she is also recognized for her environmental activism.

Neve Campbell.info: Neve Campbell is a Canadian actress known for her work in film and television. She was born on October 3, 1973, in Guelph, Ontario, Canada. As of now, she is 50 years old. Neve Campbell gained prominence for her role as Sidney Prescott in the "Scream" film series and also appeared in notable projects like the television series "Party of Five." Her career has spanned several decades, and she continues to be recognized for her contributions to the entertainment industry.

Denise Richards.info: Denise Richards is an American actress and former fashion model. She was born on February 17, 1971, in Downers Grove, Illinois, USA. As of 2023, she is 52 years old. Richards is known for her roles in films such as "Starship Troopers" (1997), "Wild Things" (1998), and as Bond girl Dr. Christmas Jones in "The World Is Not Enough" (1999). In addition to her film career, she has appeared in various television shows and reality series, including "The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills."

Heather Graham.info: Heather Graham is an American actress known for her roles in a variety of films and television series. She was born on January 29, 1970, in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA. As of 2023, Heather Graham is 53 years old. Over her career, she has been recognized for her performances in films such as "Boogie Nights," "Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me," and "The Hangover." Graham has also made appearances in several television series and remains a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Sean Young.info: Sean Young is an American actress born on November 20, 1959, in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. As of October 2023, she is 63 years old. Young gained prominence in the 1980s with her roles in films such as "Blade Runner" (1982), "Dune" (1984), and "No Way Out" (1987). Her performances and screen presence made her a notable figure in Hollywood during that era.

Tom Berenger.info:
Tom Berenger is an American actor known for his roles in a variety of films and television shows. He was born as Thomas Michael Moore on May 31, 1949, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. As of now, he is 74 years old. 

Berenger gained fame for his performances in movies such as "Platoon," for which he received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor, "The Big Chill," "Major League," and "Inception," among others. In addition to his film work, he has appeared in several television productions and series. Over the years, Berenger has been recognized for his versatile acting skills and strong screen presence.

Richard Crenna.info: Richard Crenna was an American actor born on November 30, 1926, in Los Angeles, California. He had a versatile career spanning over six decades, known for his work in radio, television, and film. Crenna began his career in radio during the 1940s before transitioning to television and film. He is perhaps best known for his roles in the TV series "Our Miss Brooks" and "The Real McCoys," and for his performances in films such as "The Sand Pebbles," "Wait Until Dark," and the "Rambo" series, where he played Colonel Sam Trautman.
