Unfortunately, Richard Crenna passed away on January 17, 2003, at the age of 76, due to pancreatic cancer. His contributions to the entertainment industry have left a lasting legacy.

Joaquin Phoenix.info: Joaquin Phoenix is a renowned actor known for his versatile performances and intense character portrayals. He was born on October 28, 1974, in San Juan, Puerto Rico. As of now, he is 48 years old. Phoenix has received critical acclaim and several awards throughout his career, including an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in the film "Joker." Known for his commitment to his roles, he often immerses himself deeply into his characters, which has made him one of the most respected actors in Hollywood. Beyond his acting career, Phoenix is also known for his activism, particularly in areas concerning animal rights and environmental issues.

Robin Tunney.info: Robin Tunney is an American actress born on June 19, 1972, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. As of now, she is 51 years old. She is widely recognized for her roles in films such as "Empire Records," "The Craft," and "End of Days," as well as for her role as Teresa Lisbon on the television series "The Mentalist." Throughout her career, Tunney has been praised for her versatile performances across various genres in both film and television.

Danny Glover.info: Danny Glover is an American actor, film director, and political activist, known for his various roles in film, television, and stage. He was born on July 22, 1946, in San Francisco, California, USA. As of 2023, Danny Glover is 77 years old. Glover gained widespread recognition for his role as Roger Murtaugh in the "Lethal Weapon" film series and has also appeared in other notable films such as "The Color Purple," "Angels in the Outfield," and "Predator 2." Beyond his acting career, Glover is also known for his social activism work, advocating for civil rights, education, and humanitarian causes globally.

Emilio Estevez.info: Emilio Estevez is an American actor, director, and writer, known for his roles in films such as "The Breakfast Club," "St. Elmo's Fire," and "The Mighty Ducks" series. He was born on May 12, 1962, in Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA. As of now, he is 61 years old. Estevez is the son of actor Martin Sheen and the brother of actors Charlie Sheen, Ramon Estevez, and Renée Estevez. He gained fame as a member of the Brat Pack, a group of young actors active in the 1980s.

Norman Reedus.info:
Norman Reedus is an American actor and model, best known for his role as Daryl Dixon on the popular television series "The Walking Dead." He was born on January 6, 1969, in Hollywood, Florida, USA. As of now, he is 54 years old.

In addition to his work on "The Walking Dead," Reedus has appeared in various films such as "The Boondock Saints" and its sequel "The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day," "Blade II," "American Gangster," and "Sky." He has also participated in modeling campaigns and music videos, showcasing his diverse talents in the entertainment industry. Reedus continues to be a prominent figure in both television and film.

Amanda Peet.info: Amanda Peet is an American actress born on January 11, 1972, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 51 years old. Peet has had a successful career in both film and television, known for her roles in movies such as "The Whole Nine Yards," "Something's Gotta Give," and "2012," as well as television series like "Jack & Jill," "Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip," and "Togetherness." Her charismatic presence and versatile acting skills have made her a recognizable figure in the entertainment industry.

Robert Forster.info: Robert Forster was an acclaimed American actor known for his versatile roles in film and television. He was born on July 13, 1941, in Rochester, New York. Forster's career spanned more than five decades, and he became widely recognized for his performances in both mainstream and independent films. Some of his notable works include "Medium Cool" (1969), "The Black Hole" (1979), and his Academy Award-nominated role in Quentin Tarantino's "Jackie Brown" (1997). He continued to work actively in the industry, appearing in movies and TV series such as "Breaking Bad" and its spin-off film "El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie." Robert Forster passed away on October 11, 2019, in Los Angeles, California, at the age of 78.

Giovanni Ribisi.info: Giovanni Ribisi is an American actor known for his versatile roles in both television and film. He was born on December 17, 1974, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of 2023, Giovanni Ribisi is 48 years old. Ribisi has appeared in a wide range of films, including notable performances in "Saving Private Ryan," "Avatar," and "Boiler Room." He has also made significant contributions to television, gaining prominence with his role in the sitcom "Friends" and the series "Sneaky Pete." Ribisi's work is characterized by his ability to deliver compelling performances across various genres.

Rudy Giuliani.info: Rudy Giuliani is not an actor; he is a politician and attorney known for serving as the Mayor of New York City from 1994 to 2001. Born as Rudolph William Louis Giuliani on May 28, 1944, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, Rudy Giuliani is currently 79 years old as of 2023. His tenure as mayor is particularly noted for his leadership during the September 11 attacks in 2001. Prior to his time as mayor, he served as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, where he gained recognition for his prosecution of organized crime and corruption. In more recent years, Giuliani has worked as a legal advisor and was prominently involved in legal efforts related to the 2020 presidential election.

Peter Dinklage.info: Peter Dinklage is an American actor best known for his role as Tyrion Lannister in the critically acclaimed HBO series "Game of Thrones." He was born on June 11, 1969, in Morristown, New Jersey, USA. As of now, he is 54 years old. Dinklage has received widespread recognition and numerous awards for his performances, including four Primetime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series for his work on "Game of Thrones." His acting career spans various genres, and he has appeared in films such as "The Station Agent," "Elf," and "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri." Dinklage is also known for his advocacy for people with disabilities, stemming from his personal experience with achondroplasia, a form of dwarfism.

Joe Pesci.info: Joe Pesci is an American actor and musician known for his distinctive and often intense performances in film and television. He was born on February 9, 1943, in Newark, New Jersey, USA. As of October 2023, Joe Pesci is 80 years old. He has been a prominent figure in the entertainment industry, renowned for his roles in movies such as "Goodfellas," "Casino," "Raging Bull," and the "Home Alone" series. His career spans several decades, during which he has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in "Goodfellas." Beyond acting, Pesci has also pursued music, showcasing his versatility as an entertainer.

Ethan Hawke.info: Ethan Hawke is an American actor, writer, and director known for his versatile roles in both independent and mainstream films. He was born on November 6, 1970, in Austin, Texas, USA. As of October 2023, he is 52 years old. Hawke gained prominence with his role in the 1989 film "Dead Poets Society" and has since appeared in a variety of critically acclaimed movies, including the "Before" trilogy, "Training Day," and "Boyhood." In addition to his work in film, he has also made significant contributions to theater and literature.

Rosie Perez.info: Rosie Perez is an American actress, choreographer, and activist known for her distinctive voice and engaging performances. She was born on September 6, 1964, in Brooklyn, New York City. As of 2023, she is 59 years old. Perez gained prominence in the late 1980s and early 1990s with roles in films such as "Do the Right Thing" (1989) and "White Men Can't Jump" (1992). In addition to her acting career, she is also recognized for her work as a choreographer on television shows like "In Living Color" and her commitment to various social and charitable causes.

Jamie Foxx.info: Jamie Foxx is an American actor, comedian, and singer. He was born Eric Marlon Bishop on December 13, 1967, in Terrell, Texas. As of October 2023, he is 55 years old. Foxx rose to fame with his standout performances in films such as "Ray," for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor, "Django Unchained," and "Collateral." He is also well-known for his work on television, including his role on the sketch comedy show "In Living Color." In addition to his acting career, Foxx has a successful music career, with hits like "Blame It" and his Grammy Award-winning collaboration with Kanye West on "Gold Digger."

Ralph Fiennes.info: Ralph Fiennes is a renowned English actor and film producer, known for his versatility and commanding screen presence. He was born on December 22, 1962, in Ipswich, Suffolk, England. As of October 2023, Ralph Fiennes is 60 years old. Fiennes has had a distinguished career, with notable roles in films such as "Schindler's List," "The English Patient," and the "Harry Potter" series, where he famously portrayed Lord Voldemort. In addition to his film work, Fiennes has also been celebrated for his stage performances and has directed several films, further showcasing his wide-ranging talents in the entertainment industry.

Hugh Jackman.info: Hugh Jackman is an Australian actor born on October 12, 1968, in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. As of 2023, he is 55 years old. Jackman is widely recognized for his versatility in various film genres, including action, drama, musicals, and romance. He gained international fame for his role as Wolverine in the "X-Men" film series. In addition to his film work, Jackman is also known for his performances in musical theater, including his Tony Award-winning portrayal of Peter Allen in "The Boy from Oz."

Pete Davidson.info: Pete Davidson is an American comedian and actor best known for being a cast member on the long-running sketch comedy show "Saturday Night Live" (SNL) from 2014 to 2022. He was born on November 16, 1993, in Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA. As of October 2023, Pete Davidson is 29 years old. Throughout his career, he has also appeared in several films and television series, gaining recognition for his unique comedic style and often candid discussions about personal and mental health issues.

Stephen Dorff.info: Stephen Dorff is an American actor known for his work in both film and television. He was born on July 29, 1973, in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. As of 2023, he is 50 years old. Dorff has appeared in a variety of roles, earning acclaim for his performances in movies such as "Blade" (1998), where he played the villain Deacon Frost, and "Somewhere" (2010), directed by Sofia Coppola, in which he starred as a disillusioned actor. He also played a significant role in the third season of the TV series "True Detective," which added to his reputation as a versatile actor.

Judd Apatow.info:
Judd Apatow is an American filmmaker, actor, and comedian best known for his work in comedy films and television. He was born on December 6, 1967, in Flushing, Queens, New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Judd Apatow is 55 years old. 

Apatow is widely recognized for his involvement in hit movies such as "The 40-Year-Old Virgin," "Knocked Up," and "Trainwreck," as well as for creating and producing television series like "Freaks and Geeks" and "Girls." His work is characterized by a blend of humor and heartfelt storytelling, often exploring themes of personal growth and relationships.

Melissa McCarthy.info: Melissa McCarthy is an American actress, comedian, producer, and writer known for her versatile performances in film and television. She was born on August 26, 1970, in Plainfield, Illinois, USA. As of October 2023, she is 53 years old. McCarthy gained prominence with her role as Sookie St. James on the television series "Gilmore Girls," but she is perhaps best known for her lead role in the comedy film "Bridesmaids," which earned her an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress. Her successful career encompasses a wide range of comedic and dramatic roles, showcasing her talent as a leading performer in Hollywood.

Jack Palance.info:
Jack Palance was an American actor known for his distinctive voice and commanding screen presence. He was born Volodymyr Palahniuk on February 18, 1919, in Lattimer Mines, Pennsylvania, USA. Palance had a long and varied career, with memorable performances in films such as "Shane" (1953), "Sudden Fear" (1952), and "City Slickers" (1991), for which he won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. 

Unfortunately, Jack Palance passed away on November 10, 2006, in Montecito, California, at the age of 87.

Regina Hall.info: Regina Hall is an American actress known for her versatility and comedic timing. She was born on December 12, 1970, in Washington, D.C., USA. As of now, Regina Hall is 52 years old. She gained prominence for her role in the "Scary Movie" film series and has since starred in numerous films and television shows, showcasing her range as an actress. Her career has spanned various genres, from comedy to drama, earning her critical acclaim and a loyal fan base.

Ralph Macchio.info: Ralph Macchio is an American actor best known for his role as Daniel LaRusso in the "Karate Kid" series and the Netflix series "Cobra Kai." He was born on November 4, 1961, in Huntington, New York, USA. As of 2023, Ralph Macchio is 61 years old. Over the years, he has become a cultural icon due to his work in the martial arts genre, and his role in "The Outsiders" also contributed to his early fame. Macchio's career spans decades, and he continues to be a beloved figure in the entertainment industry.

Nick Nolte.info: Nick Nolte is an American actor born on February 8, 1941, in Omaha, Nebraska. As of October 2023, he is 82 years old. Nolte has had a prolific career in film and television, earning acclaim for his roles in movies such as "The Prince of Tides," "Affliction," and "Warrior." Throughout his career, he has been recognized for his rugged charm and intense performances, earning multiple award nominations and winning several accolades, including a Golden Globe for Best Actor in a Motion Picture Drama. His contributions to the industry have made him a respected figure in Hollywood.

Ed Harris.info: Ed Harris is an American actor known for his versatile performances in film, television, and theater. He was born on November 28, 1950, in Englewood, New Jersey, USA. As of the current date in October 2023, Ed Harris is 72 years old. Over his career, he has earned acclaim for his roles in movies such as "The Right Stuff," "Apollo 13," "The Truman Show," and "A Beautiful Mind," among others. Harris is also celebrated for his work in theater and has received numerous awards and nominations, highlighting his talent and contribution to the entertainment industry.

Chris Pratt.info: Chris Pratt is an American actor known for his work in television and film. He was born on June 21, 1979, in Virginia, Minnesota, USA. As of now, he is 44 years old. Pratt gained widespread recognition for his roles in the television series "Parks and Recreation," where he played Andy Dwyer, as well as for major film roles in "Guardians of the Galaxy," "Jurassic World," and "The Avengers" series among others. His charismatic performances and versatility have made him a popular figure in Hollywood.

Bryce Dallas Howard.info: Bryce Dallas Howard is an American actress and director, born on March 2, 1981, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of the current year, 2023, she is 42 years old. She is known for her roles in films such as "The Village," "Lady in the Water," "As You Like It," "The Help," and the "Jurassic World" series. Bryce is the daughter of acclaimed director Ron Howard and has established herself as a prominent figure in both acting and directing in the film industry.

Gillian Anderson.info: Gillian Anderson is an American-British actress born on August 9, 1968, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. As of now, she is 55 years old. Anderson is widely known for her role as FBI Special Agent Dana Scully on the popular television series "The X-Files." Her performance on the show earned her critical acclaim and numerous awards, including an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and two Screen Actors Guild Awards. In addition to her work on "The X-Files," Anderson has appeared in numerous films and television shows, such as "The House of Mirth," "The Fall," and "Sex Education." She has also been recognized for her stage work, appearing in productions like "A Streetcar Named Desire" and "All About Eve." Anderson holds dual citizenship for the United States and the United Kingdom and has lived in both countries throughout her life.

Sean Connery.info:
Sean Connery, born as Thomas Sean Connery, was a renowned Scottish actor best known for his role as James Bond. He was born on August 25, 1930, in Fountainbridge, Edinburgh, Scotland. Before becoming an actor, Connery worked various jobs, including as a milkman, truck driver, and lifeguard. His career breakthrough came with the role of the iconic British secret agent, James Bond, starting with the 1962 film "Dr. No." Connery played Bond in a total of seven films, causing him to become synonymous with the character.

Connery's acting career spanned several decades and included a diverse range of roles in films such as "The Untouchables," for which he won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor, "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade," "The Hunt for Red October," and "The Rock."

Sean Connery passed away at the age of 90 on October 31, 2020, in Nassau, Bahamas. His contribution to the film industry and his iconic portrayal of James Bond have left a lasting legacy.

Kim Basinger.info: Kim Basinger is an American actress, singer, and former fashion model. She was born on December 8, 1953, in Athens, Georgia, USA. As of now, she is 69 years old. Basinger gained prominence in the 1980s with roles in films such as "Never Say Never Again" (1983) and "9½ Weeks" (1986), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in "L.A. Confidential" (1997). She has also been involved in philanthropy and various environmental and animal rights causes throughout her career.

Heath Ledger.info: Heath Ledger was an Australian actor born on April 4, 1979, in Perth, Western Australia. Known for his versatile acting and charismatic presence, Ledger gained international acclaim for his roles in films such as "Brokeback Mountain" and "The Dark Knight." Tragically, he passed away at the young age of 28, on January 22, 2008, in New York City, New York, United States. Ledger's performance as the Joker in "The Dark Knight" posthumously won him numerous awards, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. His talent and contributions to the film industry continue to be celebrated and remembered.

James Spader.info: James Spader is an American actor born on February 7, 1960, in Boston, Massachusetts. As of 2023, he is 63 years old. Spader is well known for his diverse roles in film and television. Some of his most notable work includes his performances in films like "Sex, Lies, and Videotape," "Stargate," and "Secretary." He has also gained significant acclaim for his role as Raymond "Red" Reddington in the television series "The Blacklist." Spader's unique voice and ability to portray eccentric and enigmatic characters have made him a memorable figure in the entertainment industry.

Sam Elliott.info: Sam Elliott is an American actor known for his distinctive deep voice, bushy moustache, and rugged Western look, which have made him a prominent figure in the film industry, particularly in western and action genres. He was born on August 9, 1944, in Sacramento, California, USA. As of October 2023, Sam Elliott is 79 years old. Throughout his career, he has appeared in numerous films and television series, with notable performances in movies such as "Tombstone," "The Big Lebowski," and "A Star is Born," among others. His distinguished voice has also led him to numerous voice-over and narration roles.

Peter Sarsgaard.info: Peter Sarsgaard is an American actor known for his versatile roles in both independent films and major Hollywood productions. He was born on March 7, 1971, at Scott Air Force Base in Illinois, United States. As of October 2023, he is 52 years old. Sarsgaard has gained critical acclaim for his performances in films such as "Shattered Glass," "Kinsey," and "An Education," as well as in popular movies like "The Magnificent Seven" and "Jarhead." He is also known for his television work, including his role in "The Looming Tower." Married to actress Maggie Gyllenhaal, Sarsgaard continues to contribute significantly to the film industry with his dynamic acting skills.

Aaron Eckhart.info: Aaron Eckhart is an American actor known for his versatile roles in film and theater. He was born on March 12, 1968, in Cupertino, California, USA. As of October 2023, he is 55 years old. Eckhart gained widespread recognition for his role as Harvey Dent/Two-Face in "The Dark Knight" (2008) and has appeared in various other films such as "Thank You for Smoking" (2005), "In the Company of Men" (1997), and "Battle: Los Angeles" (2011). His acting career is characterized by his ability to portray complex characters with depth and nuance.

Daniel Craig.info: Daniel Craig is a British actor born on March 2, 1968, in Chester, Cheshire, England. As of 2023, he is 55 years old. He is best known for his role as James Bond in the film series, starting with "Casino Royale" in 2006 and continuing through several other Bond films, including "Quantum of Solace" (2008), "Skyfall" (2012), "Spectre" (2015), and "No Time to Die" (2021). Craig's portrayal of the iconic character has been critically acclaimed and has brought a new depth to the Bond persona. In addition to his work in the Bond series, Daniel Craig has appeared in various other films such as "Knives Out" (2019), "The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo" (2011), and "Layer Cake" (2004). With a robust career spanning over decades, Craig continues to be a prominent figure in the film industry.

Dawn French.info: Dawn French is a renowned British actress, comedian, and writer, best known for her work in television and as one half of the comedy duo French and Saunders alongside Jennifer Saunders. She was born on October 11, 1957, in Holyhead, Wales, United Kingdom. As of now, this makes her 66 years old. Over her career, French has become a beloved figure in British comedy, particularly for her role as Geraldine Granger in the sitcom "The Vicar of Dibley." Her work has earned her numerous accolades and a significant fanbase.

Barry Humphries.info:
Barry Humphries is an Australian actor, comedian, satirist, and author, widely known for his role as the flamboyant and iconic character Dame Edna Everage. He was born on February 17, 1934, in Kew, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

As of now, Barry Humphries is 89 years old. Besides his most famous alter ego, he also created and portrayed several other characters, such as Sir Les Patterson, a vulgar Australian cultural attaché. Humphries has had a significant impact on the entertainment industry, not only in Australia but also internationally, through stage performances, television shows, and writing.

Craig Ferguson.info: Craig Ferguson is a Scottish-American actor, comedian, writer, and television host. He was born on May 17, 1962, in Springburn, Glasgow, Scotland. As of now, he is 61 years old. Ferguson began his career in the United Kingdom before transitioning to American television, where he became best known for hosting "The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson" on CBS from 2005 to 2014. In addition to his television work, Ferguson has appeared in various films and stage productions, authored several books, and lent his voice to animated projects.

Jeffrey Wright.info: Jeffrey Wright is an acclaimed American actor known for his versatile roles in both film and television. He was born on December 7, 1965, in Washington, D.C., USA. As of the current date, he is 57 years old. Wright has received critical acclaim for his work in projects like "Angels in America," "Westworld," and the James Bond film series, among others. His talent and ability to adapt to various roles have made him a respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Anne Bancroft.info:
Anne Bancroft was an acclaimed American actress, known for her versatile performances in film, television, and theater. She was born Anna Maria Louisa Italiano on September 17, 1931, in the Bronx, New York City, USA. Bancroft built a distinguished career over several decades, earning numerous accolades including an Academy Award, three BAFTA Awards, two Golden Globes, two Tony Awards, and two Emmy Awards.

As of October 2023, Anne Bancroft would have been 92 years old. However, she passed away on June 6, 2005, at the age of 73, due to uterine cancer. Her contributions to the entertainment industry are fondly remembered, with her most iconic role being that of Mrs. Robinson in the 1967 film "The Graduate."

Rene Russo.info: Rene Russo is an American actress and former model, born on February 17, 1954, in Burbank, California, USA. As of October 2023, she is 69 years old. Russo's career began in the fashion industry before she transitioned to acting, where she gained recognition for her roles in films such as "Lethal Weapon 3" (1992), "Get Shorty" (1995), "Ransom" (1996), "The Thomas Crown Affair" (1999), and "Nightcrawler" (2014). Over the years, she has built a reputation for her strong performances in both action-packed and dramatic roles.

Barbra Streisand.info: Barbra Streisand is an iconic American singer, actress, and filmmaker known for her distinctive voice and versatile performances. She was born on April 24, 1942, in Brooklyn, New York, USA. As of 2023, she is 81 years old. Streisand's illustrious career spans several decades, and she has achieved significant success in both music and film, earning numerous awards including multiple Grammys, Oscars, and Emmys. Her work continues to influence artists across various genres, solidifying her status as a legendary figure in the entertainment industry.

Al Pacino.info: Al Pacino, an iconic American actor, was born on April 25, 1940, in New York City, New York. Known for his intense and memorable performances, he has had a remarkable career in film, television, and stage. As of now, he is 83 years old. Pacino rose to fame in the early 1970s through his role as Michael Corleone in "The Godfather" series and has since become a revered figure in the acting world, earning numerous awards and nominations throughout his career.

Julie Christie.info: Julie Christie is an accomplished British actress renowned for her roles in classic films from the 1960s and 1970s. She was born on April 14, 1940, in Chabua, Assam, India, where her father worked as an executive in the tea industry. As of October 2023, she is 83 years old. Christie's career spans several decades, and she is widely celebrated for her performances in films like "Darling" (1965), for which she won the Academy Award for Best Actress, "Doctor Zhivago" (1965), and "Far from the Madding Crowd" (1967). Her enduring legacy in cinema has earned her numerous accolades and a reputation as one of the most talented actresses of her generation.

Burt Reynolds.info:
Burt Reynolds was an American actor and director, known for his charismatic presence and charm on screen. He was born on February 11, 1936, in Lansing, Michigan, USA. Burt Reynolds gained widespread recognition in the 1970s for his roles in films like "Deliverance" (1972), "Smokey and the Bandit" (1977), and "The Longest Yard" (1974). He continued to have a successful career in both film and television for several decades.

Unfortunately, Burt Reynolds passed away on September 6, 2018, at the age of 82. Despite his passing, his legacy in the entertainment industry remains strong, with many considering him one of the leading actors of his time.

Warren Beatty.info: Warren Beatty is a renowned American actor, producer, director, and screenwriter, known for his charismatic presence and significant contributions to the film industry. He was born on March 30, 1937, in Richmond, Virginia, USA. As of 2023, Warren Beatty is 86 years old. Over his long and successful career, Beatty has been nominated for numerous awards and has received several accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Director for the film "Reds" in 1981. His work spans various genres, and he is recognized for his performances in films such as "Bonnie and Clyde," "Shampoo," and "Heaven Can Wait." His contributions behind the camera have also been notable, cementing his legacy as one of Hollywood's prominent figures.

Zach Galifianakis.info: Zach Galifianakis is an American actor and comedian best known for his roles in "The Hangover" film series and his unique brand of humor. He was born on October 1, 1969, in Wilkesboro, North Carolina, USA. As of 2023, he is 54 years old. Galifianakis has also gained recognition for his work in television, particularly for his talk show parody "Between Two Ferns," which showcases his distinctive comedy style in interviews with various celebrities.

Jack Black.info: Jack Black, whose full name is Thomas Jacob Black, is an American actor, comedian, musician, and producer. He was born on August 28, 1969, in Santa Monica, California, USA. As of October 2023, he is 54 years old. Jack Black is well-known for his roles in films such as "School of Rock," "Kung Fu Panda," and "Tropic Thunder," as well as for being part of the comedic rock duo Tenacious D.

Stephen Baldwin.info: Stephen Baldwin is an American actor, producer, and author, born on May 12, 1966, in Massapequa, New York, United States. As of 2023, he is 57 years old. Baldwin is known for his roles in films such as "The Usual Suspects" (1995) and "Bio-Dome" (1996). He is the youngest of the Baldwin brothers, a family prominent in the entertainment industry. In addition to his acting career, Stephen Baldwin has also ventured into reality television and authored a book discussing his faith and experiences.

Marcello Mastroianni.info: Marcello Mastroianni was an Italian actor, renowned for his work in international cinema. He was born on September 28, 1924, in Fontana Liri, a small town in Italy's Lazio region. Mastroianni grew up in Turin and Rome and became one of Italy's leading figures in cinema, especially noted for his collaborations with iconic director Federico Fellini. Some of his most acclaimed films include "La Dolce Vita," "8½," and "Divorce Italian Style." Mastroianni passed away at the age of 72 on December 19, 1996, but remains a celebrated figure in the world of film for his versatile performances and charismatic screen presence.

Mira Sorvino.info: Mira Sorvino is an American actress known for her work in both film and television. She was born on September 28, 1967, in Tenafly, New Jersey, USA. As of now, she is 56 years old. Sorvino gained widespread recognition for her performance in the 1995 film "Mighty Aphrodite," for which she won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. She has appeared in a variety of roles across different genres, establishing herself as a versatile actress in the entertainment industry.

John Hurt.info:
John Hurt was a renowned English actor known for his compelling performances in film, television, and theater. He was born on January 22, 1940, in Chesterfield, Derbyshire, England.

Throughout his illustrious career, John Hurt portrayed a wide range of characters, showcasing his versatility and depth as an actor. Some of his most notable roles include the title character in "The Elephant Man" (1980), his portrayal of Winston Smith in "Nineteen Eighty-Four" (1984), his role as the misunderstood artist Quentin Crisp in "The Naked Civil Servant" (1975), and his chilling performance as the deformed Joseph Merrick in "The Elephant Man." 

John Hurt gained further recognition for his performances in films such as "Alien" (1979), "Midnight Express" (1978), "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone" (2001), and "V for Vendetta" (2005).

John Hurt passed away on January 25, 2017, at the age of 77. Despite his passing, his remarkable contributions to the arts continue to be celebrated and remembered by film enthusiasts and critics alike.

Rami Malek.info: Rami Malek is an acclaimed American actor, best known for his versatility and intense acting skills. He was born on May 12, 1981, in Los Angeles, California, USA. As of now, he is 42 years old. Malek gained widespread recognition for playing the lead role of Elliot Alderson in the critically acclaimed television series "Mr. Robot," which earned him an Emmy Award. He further solidified his status in Hollywood with his portrayal of Freddie Mercury in the biographical film "Bohemian Rhapsody" (2018), a role that earned him an Academy Award for Best Actor.

John Cusack.info: John Cusack is an American actor, producer, and screenwriter renowned for his versatile performances across a variety of film genres. He was born on June 28, 1966, in Evanston, Illinois, USA. As of now, he is 57 years old. Cusack came into prominence in the 1980s and gained widespread recognition for his roles in films such as "Say Anything...", "Grosse Pointe Blank", "High Fidelity", and "Being John Malkovich". He comes from a family involved in the entertainment industry, with his siblings Joan and Ann Cusack also being actors.

Leslie Mann.info: Leslie Mann is an American actress known for her roles in both comedic and dramatic films. She was born on March 26, 1972, in San Francisco, California, USA. As of now, she is 51 years old. Mann has had a successful career, often collaborating with her husband, director Judd Apatow, in films such as "The 40-Year-Old Virgin," "Knocked Up," "This Is 40," and "Funny People." Her charm and comedic timing have made her a favorite among audiences and critics alike.

Emma Roberts.info: Emma Roberts is an American actress born on February 10, 1991, in Rhinebeck, New York, USA. As of the current date in 2023, she is 32 years old. Roberts comes from a family with a strong presence in the entertainment industry, being the daughter of actor Eric Roberts and the niece of actress Julia Roberts. She rose to prominence with her role as Addie Singer on the Nickelodeon television series "Unfabulous" and has since appeared in several films and television series, including "American Horror Story," "Scream Queens," and "We’re the Millers."

Sofia Vergara.info: Sofía Vergara is a Colombian-American actress, television producer, and model. She was born on July 10, 1972, in Barranquilla, Colombia. As of now, she is 51 years old. Vergara rose to prominence in the late 1990s, co-hosting two television shows for the Spanish-language television network Univisión. Her breakthrough role came when she was cast as Gloria Delgado-Pritchett on the hit ABC series "Modern Family," which aired from 2009 to 2020. The role earned her critical acclaim and several award nominations. Additionally, Vergara is known for her work in films such as "Chef" and "Hot Pursuit" and has been involved in various entrepreneurial ventures.

Kate Winslet.info: Kate Winslet is an acclaimed English actress born on October 5, 1975, in Reading, Berkshire, England. As of the current date in 2023, she is 48 years old. She has gained widespread recognition for her roles in a variety of films and television productions, with notable performances in movies such as "Titanic," "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind," "The Reader," and "Revolutionary Road." Winslet has received numerous awards throughout her career, including an Academy Award, an Emmy Award, and multiple Golden Globe Awards, solidifying her status as one of the leading actresses of her generation.

Salma Hayek.info: Salma Hayek is a renowned Mexican-American actress and producer, born on September 2, 1966, in Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz, Mexico. As of now, she is 57 years old. Hayek gained widespread recognition for her performance in the 2002 film "Frida," where she portrayed the iconic Mexican painter Frida Kahlo. Over the years, she has established herself as a prominent figure in Hollywood with a career spanning various genres and roles. In addition to her acting accolades, Hayek is also known for her work as a producer and her involvement in various charitable causes.

Tina Fey.info: Tina Fey is an American actress, comedian, writer, and producer. She was born on May 18, 1970, in Upper Darby, Pennsylvania, USA. As of October 2023, Tina Fey is 53 years old. She is best known for her work on "Saturday Night Live," where she served as a writer and performer, and for creating and starring in the critically acclaimed television series "30 Rock." Fey has also appeared in several films and has received numerous awards for her contributions to comedy and entertainment.

Martin Short.info: Martin Short is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, and writer known for his work in television, film, and theater. He was born on March 26, 1950, in Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. As of now, Martin Short is 73 years old. Throughout his career, Short has become renowned for his versatility in comedy, known for his many characters and energetic performances. He gained prominence as a cast member of "SCTV" and later "Saturday Night Live," and he has appeared in numerous films, such as "Three Amigos," "Father of the Bride," and "Innerspace." In addition to his screen work, he is celebrated for his contributions to stage productions and continues to be a beloved figure in the entertainment industry.

Donald Pleasence.info: Donald Pleasence was an English actor born on October 5, 1919, in Worksop, Nottinghamshire, England. He passed away on February 2, 1995, at the age of 75. Pleasence had a prolific acting career and was known for his distinctive voice and intense screen presence. He appeared in numerous films and television shows, perhaps most notably known for his role as Dr. Sam Loomis in the "Halloween" film series and as the villain Ernst Stavro Blofeld in the James Bond film "You Only Live Twice." Throughout his career, Pleasence received critical acclaim and left a lasting impact on the film industry.

Leonard Nimoy.info:
Leonard Nimoy was an American actor, film director, author, and musician, best known for his iconic role as Spock in the "Star Trek" franchise. He was born on March 26, 1931, in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. Nimoy's portrayal of Spock, the half-human, half-Vulcan science officer of the starship Enterprise, made a significant cultural impact and garnered a devoted fanbase.

Leonard Nimoy passed away on February 27, 2015, at the age of 83. In addition to his work in "Star Trek," Nimoy had a diverse career that included acting in other films and television series, directing, writing poetry, and pursuing his passion for photography. His contributions to the arts and his memorable portrayal of Spock continue to be celebrated by fans around the world.

Joseph Fiennes.info: Joseph Fiennes is an English actor, born on May 27, 1970, in Salisbury, Wiltshire, England. As of today, Joseph Fiennes is 53 years old. He is known for his work in film, television, and theater, with notable roles in movies such as "Shakespeare in Love" (1998), where he portrayed William Shakespeare, and in the television series "The Handmaid's Tale," where he plays the character Fred Waterford. Joseph comes from a creative family, being the brother of actor Ralph Fiennes, and he has established a successful career with a variety of roles in both classic and contemporary productions.

Cybill Shepherd.info: Cybill Shepherd is an American actress and former model born on February 18, 1950, in Memphis, Tennessee, USA. As of now, she is 73 years old. Shepherd is best known for her roles in films such as "The Last Picture Show" (1971) and "Taxi Driver" (1976), as well as her television work, most notably in the series "Moonlighting" alongside Bruce Willis, and "Cybill," a sitcom inspired by her own life. Throughout her career, she has been recognized for her talent and charisma, making her a prominent figure in both film and television.

Kate Bosworth.info: Kate Bosworth is an American actress and model, born on January 2, 1983, in Los Angeles, California, United States. As of the current date in 2023, she is 40 years old. Bosworth is well-known for her roles in films such as "Blue Crush," "Superman Returns," and "Still Alice." She has been active in the entertainment industry since her teenage years and has worked on a variety of film and television projects throughout her career.

Elle Fanning.info: Elle Fanning is an American actress who was born on April 9, 1998, in Conyers, Georgia, USA. As of October 2023, she is 25 years old. Elle is the younger sister of actress Dakota Fanning and has built a successful career in the film industry, known for her roles in movies such as "Maleficent," "Super 8," and "The Neon Demon." She has received critical acclaim for her performances and continues to be a prominent figure in Hollywood.

Helen Mirren.info: Helen Mirren is an acclaimed British actress, born on July 26, 1945, in Hammersmith, London, England. As of 2023, she is 78 years old. Over her illustrious career, Mirren has garnered widespread recognition for her work in film, television, and theater, earning numerous awards, including an Academy Award, several BAFTA Awards, and Emmy Awards. She is particularly noted for her roles in productions such as "The Queen," where she played Queen Elizabeth II, and the acclaimed series "Prime Suspect."

Ryan Reynolds.info: Ryan Reynolds is a Canadian actor born on October 23, 1976, in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. As of 2023, he is 47 years old. Reynolds is widely recognized for his roles in various films, including his breakthrough performance in the comic book adaptation "Deadpool," where he played the titular character. He has also appeared in movies such as "The Proposal," "6 Underground," "Free Guy," and "Green Lantern." Known for his charismatic and witty personality, Ryan Reynolds has become a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Paul Bettany.info: Paul Bettany is a talented English actor born on May 27, 1971, in London, England. As of now, he is 52 years old. Bettany is widely recognized for his versatility and range in acting, having appeared in numerous films and television productions. He gained significant attention for his role as J.A.R.V.I.S. and Vision in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Beyond this, he has starred in other notable films such as "A Beautiful Mind," "Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World," and "Wimbledon." Known for his distinctive voice and commanding presence, Bettany continues to captivate audiences with his compelling performances.

Wes Studi.info: Wes Studi is a Native American actor and producer known for his work in numerous films that explore Native American themes and history. He was born on December 17, 1947, in Nofire Hollow, Oklahoma, which is located in the Cherokee Nation. As of October 2023, Wes Studi is 75 years old. Studi has gained acclaim for his roles in films such as "Dances with Wolves" (1990), "The Last of the Mohicans" (1992), "Geronimo: An American Legend" (1993), and "Avatar" (2009). In addition to his work on screen, he has been an advocate for Native American representation in the film industry.

Kiefer Sutherland.info: Kiefer Sutherland is a British-Canadian actor, known for his work across film and television. He was born on December 21, 1966, in London, England. As of 2023, Kiefer Sutherland is 56 years old. He is the son of Donald Sutherland and Shirley Douglas, both of whom were prominent figures in the entertainment industry. Kiefer gained widespread recognition for his portrayal of Jack Bauer in the television series "24." Over the course of his career, he has appeared in numerous films, including "Stand by Me," "The Lost Boys," "Flatliners," and "A Few Good Men."

Julie Delpy.info: Julie Delpy is a French-American actress, filmmaker, and singer-songwriter. She was born on December 21, 1969, in Paris, France. Delpy is widely recognized for her roles in films such as "Before Sunrise" (1995), "Before Sunset" (2004), and "Before Midnight" (2013), which she co-wrote and which earned her Academy Award nominations for Best Adapted Screenplay. As of now, she is 53 years old. Delpy's versatile career spans acting, directing, and writing, showcasing her talents across various facets of the film industry.

Rachel McAdams.info: Rachel McAdams is a Canadian actress born on November 17, 1978, in London, Ontario, Canada. As of 2023, she is 44 years old. Rachel McAdams gained fame through her roles in films such as "Mean Girls," "The Notebook," "Wedding Crashers," and "Spotlight," showcasing her versatility and talent across various genres. She has been recognized for her work with multiple award nominations, including an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "Spotlight."

Tom Wilkinson.info: Tom Wilkinson is a renowned English actor, born on February 5, 1948, in Leeds, West Yorkshire, England. As of 2023, he is 75 years old. Wilkinson has had a distinguished career in film, television, and stage, and he is known for his versatility in playing a wide variety of roles. His performances have earned him critical acclaim, including two Academy Award nominations and numerous other accolades. Some of his notable films include "The Full Monty," "In the Bedroom," "Michael Clayton," and "Selma."

Jennifer Jason Leigh.info: Jennifer Jason Leigh is an American actress known for her versatile roles in film, television, and theater. She was born on February 5, 1962, in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA. As of now, she is 61 years old. Leigh has garnered acclaim for her performances in movies such as "Fast Times at Ridgemont High," "Single White Female," "The Hateful Eight," and a wide array of independent films. Her dedication to her craft and ability to portray complex characters have made her a respected figure in the entertainment industry.

Anna Paquin.info:
Anna Paquin is a Canadian-born New Zealand actress known for her versatility and strong performances across film and television. She was born on July 24, 1982, in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. As of now, she is 41 years old.

Paquin gained international fame at a young age when she won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "The Piano" (1993) at just 11 years old. Her career continued to flourish with roles in films such as "Fly Away Home" (1996), "She's All That" (1999), and the "X-Men" film series, where she played the character Rogue.

In addition to her film work, Paquin has made significant contributions to television. She is perhaps best known for her role as Sookie Stackhouse in the HBO series "True Blood," which aired from 2008 to 2014. Her performance in the series earned her a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress in a Television Series – Drama.

Anna Paquin moved to New Zealand with her family when she was a young child, which is where she was largely raised and where she began her acting career. Despite her early start in acting, she has demonstrated longevity and continues to be a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Paul Le Mat.info: Paul Le Mat is an American actor known for his work in the film and television industry, particularly during the 1970s and 1980s. He was born on September 22, 1945, in Rahway, New Jersey, USA. As of 2023, Paul Le Mat is 78 years old. He gained prominence for his role as John Milner in the classic film "American Graffiti" (1973), which was directed by George Lucas. Le Mat's performance in "American Graffiti" helped him achieve a level of recognition that led to further roles in films such as "Melvin and Howard" (1980) and "The Burning Bed" (1984). Throughout his career, Le Mat has received acclaim for his versatile performances and his ability to bring depth to the characters he portrays.

Sam Shepard.info: Sam Shepard was an American actor, playwright, author, screenwriter, and director, widely acclaimed for his work both on stage and in film. He was born on November 5, 1943, in Fort Sheridan, Illinois, USA. Shepard's career spanned several decades, during which he became renowned for his distinct voice in American theater and his compelling presence on screen. Some of his notable film performances include roles in "Days of Heaven" (1978), "The Right Stuff" (1983), and "August: Osage County" (2013). Additionally, he was a prolific playwright, winning a Pulitzer Prize for Drama for his play "Buried Child" in 1979. Sam Shepard passed away on July 27, 2017, at the age of 73, in Midway, Kentucky.

Hilary Swank.info: Hilary Swank is an American actress born on July 30, 1974, in Lincoln, Nebraska, USA. As of the current year, 2023, she is 49 years old. Swank is best known for her Academy Award-winning performances in "Boys Don't Cry" (1999) and "Million Dollar Baby" (2004), where she showcased her remarkable talent and versatility as an actress. Throughout her career, she has been celebrated for her dedication to her roles and her ability to bring complex characters to life on screen.

Kim Cattrall.info: Kim Cattrall is a Canadian-American actress best known for her role as Samantha Jones on the HBO series "Sex and the City." She was born on August 21, 1956, in Liverpool, England. As of 2023, she is 67 years old. Cattrall's career spans several decades, during which she has appeared in numerous films, television shows, and stage productions. In addition to her work on "Sex and the City," she has also been notable in films such as "Porky's" (1981), "Police Academy" (1984), and "Big Trouble in Little China" (1986), among others. Cattrall's work has earned her various awards and nominations, including Golden Globe and Screen Actors Guild Awards.

Cynthia Nixon.info: Cynthia Nixon is an accomplished American actress and activist, best known for her role as Miranda Hobbes in the popular television series "Sex and the City." She was born on April 9, 1966, in New York City, New York. As of October 2023, she is 57 years old. Outside of her acting career, Nixon is also recognized for her involvement in political and social activism, having run for the Governor of New York in 2018.

Kristin Davis.info: Kristin Davis is an American actress best known for her role as Charlotte York Goldenblatt on the television series "Sex and the City." She was born on February 24, 1965, in Boulder, Colorado, USA. As of 2023, Kristin Davis is 58 years old. In addition to her iconic role on "Sex and the City," she has appeared in several films and television shows and has worked as a producer and humanitarian, actively supporting causes like animal rights and education.

Chris Noth.info: Chris Noth is an American actor best known for his roles on popular television series such as "Law & Order" and "Sex and the City." He was born on November 13, 1954, in Madison, Wisconsin, USA. As of October 2023, Chris Noth is 68 years old.

Willie Garson.info:
Willie Garson was an American actor known for his versatile roles in television and film. He was born on February 20, 1964, in Highland Park, New Jersey, USA. Garson is perhaps best remembered for his portrayal of Stanford Blatch on the popular TV series "Sex and the City." He also appeared in numerous other shows and movies, including "White Collar," where he played Mozzie, a character beloved by many fans.

Unfortunately, Willie Garson passed away on September 21, 2021, at the age of 57. His contributions to the entertainment industry and his memorable performances remain celebrated by fans and colleagues alike.

Kim Raver.info: Kim Raver is an American actress known for her roles in television series such as "Third Watch," "24," and more recently "Grey's Anatomy." She was born on March 15, 1969, in New York City, New York, USA. As of now, she is 54 years old. Raver's career has spanned multiple decades, during which she has earned acclaim for her compelling performances on both television and the stage.

Dermot Mulroney.info: Dermot Mulroney is an American actor and musician known for his work in film and television. He was born on October 31, 1963, in Alexandria, Virginia, USA. This makes him currently 59 years old as of 2023. Mulroney has appeared in a wide variety of roles, often recognized for his work in romantic comedies, dramas, and independent films. Some of his notable films include "My Best Friend's Wedding," "The Wedding Date," and "August: Osage County." In addition to his career in acting, Mulroney is also a talented cellist and has contributed to the soundtracks of several movies.

Oscar Isaac.info:
Oscar Isaac, born Óscar Isaac Hernández Estrada, is a celebrated actor and musician known for his versatile roles in film, television, and theater. He was born on March 9, 1979, in Guatemala City, Guatemala. This makes him 44 years old as of 2023.

Isaac moved to the United States with his family during his childhood and was raised in Miami, Florida. He eventually graduated from the prestigious Juilliard School in New York City, which propelled him into a successful acting career. Isaac is renowned for his performances in movies like "Inside Llewyn Davis," "Ex Machina," "A Most Violent Year," and as Poe Dameron in the "Star Wars" sequel trilogy. His career also includes significant roles in television series such as "Show Me a Hero" and the critically acclaimed "Scenes from a Marriage."

Chris Penn.info:
Chris Penn was an American actor born on October 10, 1965, in Los Angeles, California. He was the younger brother of actor Sean Penn and musician Michael Penn, as well as the son of actress Eileen Ryan and director Leo Penn. Known for his performances in films like "Reservoir Dogs," "Footloose," "True Romance," and "Rush Hour," Chris Penn had a career that spanned various genres and roles, often portraying tough, gritty characters.

Sadly, Chris Penn passed away on January 24, 2006, at the age of 40, in Santa Monica, California. Despite his untimely death, he left behind a legacy of diverse and memorable performances in the entertainment industry.

Vincent D'Onofrio.info: Vincent D'Onofrio is an American actor, director, producer, and musician. He was born on June 30, 1959, in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. As of now, he is 64 years old. D'Onofrio is well-known for his versatile acting roles, both in film and television. Some of his most notable performances include his portrayal of Private Leonard "Gomer Pyle" Lawrence in Stanley Kubrick's "Full Metal Jacket" (1987) and Detective Robert Goren in the television series "Law & Order: Criminal Intent." D'Onofrio's career spans several decades and includes a wide range of roles in various genres, showcasing his ability to delve into complex and varied characters.

James Gandolfini.info:
James Gandolfini was an American actor best known for his role as Tony Soprano in the critically acclaimed HBO series "The Sopranos." He was born on September 18, 1961, in Westwood, New Jersey, USA. Gandolfini had a successful career in both television and film, earning multiple awards for his performances, including three Emmy Awards and a Golden Globe for his work on "The Sopranos."

Tragically, James Gandolfini passed away on June 19, 2013, at the age of 51 while on vacation in Rome, Italy. His sudden death was a significant loss to the entertainment industry, and he is remembered for his immense talent and contributions to film and television.

Johnny Knoxville.info: Johnny Knoxville is an American actor, comedian, and stunt performer best known for being a co-creator and star of the MTV reality series "Jackass," which aired from 2000 to 2002. He was born as Philip John Clapp on March 11, 1971, in Knoxville, Tennessee, which is where he derived his stage name. As of now, he is 52 years old. Knoxville has also appeared in various films, including "Men in Black II," "The Dukes of Hazzard," and the "Jackass" movie series. Beyond acting and performing stunts, he has contributed to various projects as a writer and producer.

Dennis Dugan.info: Dennis Dugan is an American actor, director, and comedian, known for his work both in front of and behind the camera. He was born on September 5, 1946, in Wheaton, Illinois, USA. As of 2023, Dennis Dugan is 77 years old. Dugan has had a long career in the entertainment industry, with notable acting roles in TV series like "Richie Brockelman, Private Eye" and appearances in shows such as "M*A*S*H" and "The Rockford Files." He is also renowned for directing several successful comedy films, especially those starring Adam Sandler, including "Happy Gilmore," "Big Daddy," and "Grown Ups."

Laurie's career spans various media, including film and television, and he has received numerous awards and nominations for his work, showcasing his versatility and talent in the entertainment industry. Additionally, he's also a skilled musician, having released a couple of blues albums, which further highlights his diverse artistic abilities.

Hugh Bonneville.info: Hugh Bonneville is a British actor best known for his role as Robert Crawley, the Earl of Grantham, in the acclaimed television series "Downton Abbey." He was born on November 10, 1963, in Paddington, London, England. As of 2023, Hugh Bonneville is 59 years old. He has had a diverse career in both film and television, with notable appearances in films such as "Notting Hill" and "The Monuments Men," as well as TV series like "Twenty Twelve" and "W1A." Bonneville has received several award nominations for his performances, showcasing his talent and versatility as an actor.

Robert Carlyle.info: Robert Carlyle is a Scottish actor known for his versatile roles in film and television. He was born on April 14, 1961, in Maryhill, Glasgow, Scotland. As of 2023, he is 62 years old. Carlyle gained international attention for his performances in films such as "Trainspotting" (1996), "The Full Monty" (1997), "28 Weeks Later" (2007), and in the television series "Once Upon a Time" where he played the role of Rumpelstiltskin. His acting career is marked by his capability to portray complex and diverse characters, earning him critical acclaim and a strong fan base.

Imelda Staunton.info: Imelda Staunton is a renowned British actress known for her work in film, television, and theater. She was born on January 9, 1956, in Archway, London, England, United Kingdom. As of 2023, she is 67 years old. Staunton has had a distinguished career, earning acclaim for her roles in various productions, ranging from stage performances in London's West End to notable appearances in films such as "Vera Drake," for which she received an Academy Award nomination, and as Dolores Umbridge in the "Harry Potter" series. She continues to be a prominent figure in the entertainment industry.

Peter Vaughan.info:
Peter Vaughan was an English character actor known for his work in television and film. He was born on April 4, 1923, in Wem, Shropshire, England. Vaughan had a long and varied career, appearing in numerous TV series and movies over several decades. Some of his notable roles include appearances in "Porridge," "Straw Dogs," and as Maester Aemon in the popular TV series "Game of Thrones." Vaughan was acclaimed for his ability to portray both gentle and menacing characters with equal skill.

Unfortunately, Peter Vaughan passed away on December 6, 2016, at the age of 93.

Emma Watson.info: Emma Watson is a British actress and activist born on April 15, 1990, in Paris, France. As of now, she is 33 years old. Watson gained worldwide fame for her role as Hermione Granger in the "Harry Potter" film series, which she was cast in at a young age. After the series concluded, she continued her acting career with notable roles in films such as "The Perks of Being a Wallflower," "The Bling Ring," "Beauty and the Beast," and "Little Women." Apart from her acting career, Emma Watson is also known for her activism, particularly in advocating for gender equality and women's rights. She was appointed as a United Nations Women Goodwill Ambassador and helped launch the HeForShe campaign, which encourages men to advocate for gender equality.

Dan Stevens.info: Dan Stevens is a British actor born on October 10, 1982, in Croydon, London, England. As of now, he is 41 years old. Stevens is best known for his role as Matthew Crawley in the popular British television series "Downton Abbey." He has also starred in films such as "Beauty and the Beast" (2017), where he played the role of The Beast, and "The Guest" (2014). In addition to his work on screen, Stevens has appeared in stage productions and voiced audiobooks. His diverse acting skills have earned him recognition both in the UK and internationally.

Ian Holm.info: Ian Holm was a distinguished English actor, known for his versatile performances across film, television, and stage. He was born on September 12, 1931, in Goodmayes, Essex, England. As of his passing on June 19, 2020, he was 88 years old. Holm had a prolific career and was highly regarded for his roles in films such as "Alien," "Chariots of Fire," and "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy, where he memorably portrayed Bilbo Baggins. Throughout his career, he received numerous accolades, including a BAFTA Award and a Laurence Olivier Award, marking him as one of the notable talents of his generation.

Robbie Coltrane.info:
Robbie Coltrane, whose full name is Anthony Robert McMillan, was a renowned Scottish actor and comedian. He was born on March 30, 1950, in Rutherglen, South Lanarkshire, Scotland. Coltrane was best known for his role as Rubeus Hagrid in the "Harry Potter" film series and as Dr. Eddie "Fitz" Fitzgerald in the television series "Cracker." 

The actor passed away on October 14, 2022, at the age of 72. Throughout his career, Coltrane was celebrated for his versatility in both comedic and dramatic roles, earning numerous awards and nominations. He left a significant mark on the entertainment industry with his unforgettable performances.

Jennifer Ehle.info: Jennifer Ehle is an accomplished actress born on December 29, 1969, in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, USA. As of now, she is 53 years old. Ehle is best known for her role as Elizabeth Bennet in the 1995 BBC television adaptation of Jane Austen's "Pride and Prejudice," a performance that earned her significant acclaim and a BAFTA TV Award. She has also been featured in various film, television, and stage productions, showcasing her versatility and talent as an actress. Some of her notable film appearances include "The King's Speech" (2010) and "Zero Dark Thirty" (2012). Jennifer Ehle continues to be recognized for her contributions to both stage and screen acting.

Ren\u00e9e Zellweger.info: Renée Zellweger is an acclaimed American actress born on April 25, 1969, in Katy, Texas, USA. As of the current year 2023, she is 54 years old. Zellweger gained widespread recognition for her performances in films such as "Jerry Maguire," "Bridget Jones's Diary," and "Judy," the latter of which earned her the Academy Award for Best Actress. Her versatile acting skills have made her a prominent figure in Hollywood.

Nia Long.info: Nia Long is an American actress known for her versatile performances in both film and television. She was born on October 30, 1970, in Brooklyn, New York, United States. As of now, she is 52 years old. Nia Long has gained recognition for her roles in various popular films like "Boyz n the Hood," "Love Jones," "The Best Man," and its sequels, as well as appearing in television series such as "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air" and "Empire." Her work has made her a beloved figure in the entertainment industry, admired for both her talent and her enduring presence on screen.

Stellan Skarsg\u00e5rd.info: Stellan Skarsgård is a Swedish actor known for his versatile performances in both European and American films. He was born on June 13, 1951, in Gothenburg, Sweden. As of now, he is 72 years old. Skarsgård has had a prolific career, appearing in a variety of genres, and is especially well-known for his roles in films such as "Good Will Hunting," the "Pirates of the Caribbean" series, and the "Thor" movies in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, as well as his acclaimed performances in European productions and collaborations with director Lars von Trier.

Matthew Goode.info: Matthew Goode is a British actor known for his work in film and television. He was born on April 3, 1978, in Exeter, Devon, England. As of October 2023, Matthew Goode is 45 years old. He has appeared in various notable projects, including films like "The Imitation Game," "Match Point," and "Watchmen," as well as television series such as "Downton Abbey" and "A Discovery of Witches." His performances have been well-received, and he is recognized for his versatility and talent in both dramatic and comedic roles.

Gemma Arterton.info: Gemma Arterton is a British actress born on February 2, 1986, in Gravesend, Kent, England. As of now, she is 37 years old. Arterton rose to fame through her roles in films such as "St Trinian's" (2007), where she made her debut, and the James Bond film "Quantum of Solace" (2008), where she played the character Strawberry Fields. She has since appeared in a variety of films, including "Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time" (2010), "Clash of the Titans" (2010), and "Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters" (2013). Additionally, Arterton has worked in theater and television, earning acclaim for her versatile performances.

Rachel Weisz.info: Rachel Weisz is a British-American actress born on March 7, 1970, in Westminster, London, England. As of now, she is 53 years old. Weisz has had a successful career in film, television, and theater, garnering critical acclaim for her performances in a variety of roles. She gained international recognition with her performance in "The Mummy" (1999) and its sequel "The Mummy Returns" (2001). Throughout her career, she has received numerous awards, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in "The Constant Gardener" (2005). In addition to her film career, Weisz has also been involved in theater productions, earning accolades for her stage performances.

Michael Gambon.info:
Michael Gambon was an esteemed Irish-English actor, born on October 19, 1940, in Cabra, Dublin, Ireland. He garnered widespread recognition for his versatile performances across film, television, and stage. Gambon is perhaps best known for his portrayal of Professor Albus Dumbledore in the "Harry Potter" film series, taking over the role from Richard Harris starting with "Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban" in 2004.

Michael Gambon's career spanned over five decades, during which he appeared in numerous acclaimed productions, showcasing his adaptability and depth as an actor. His stage work was highly praised, particularly his contributions to the Royal National Theatre and the Royal Shakespeare Company.

Gambon passed away on September 28, 2023, at the age of 82. His legacy continues to influence actors and entertain audiences worldwide.

Patrick Dempsey.info:
Patrick Dempsey is an American actor and race car driver commonly recognized for his role as Dr. Derek Shepherd, also known as "McDreamy," on the popular medical drama television series "Grey's Anatomy." Dempsey was born on January 13, 1966, in Lewiston, Maine, USA. As of October 2023, he is 57 years old. 

Aside from his work on "Grey's Anatomy," Patrick Dempsey has appeared in a variety of films and television shows throughout his career, including "Sweet Home Alabama," "Enchanted," and "Bridget Jones's Baby." In addition to his acting career, Dempsey is an accomplished race car driver and has participated in numerous prestigious racing events.

William Hurt.info: William Hurt was an American actor born on March 20, 1950, in Washington, D.C., United States. Known for his versatile and intense performances across a wide range of genres, Hurt gained prominence in the early 1980s. Over his career, he received numerous accolades including an Academy Award for Best Actor and multiple nominations. Unfortunately, William Hurt passed away on March 13, 2022, at the age of 71.

Kirstie Alley.info: Kirstie Alley was an American actress born on January 12, 1951, in Wichita, Kansas, United States. She was known for her roles in various television and film projects, most notably for playing Rebecca Howe on the television sitcom "Cheers," which earned her an Emmy Award and a Golden Globe. Kirstie Alley passed away on December 5, 2022, at the age of 71. Throughout her career, she was recognized for her comedic talent as well as her work in films like "Look Who's Talking" and its sequels.

Bette Midler.info: Bette Midler is an American actress, singer, and comedian, well-known for her versatile career on stage, in films, and music. She was born on December 1, 1945, in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA. As of today, she is 77 years old. Midler gained fame for her charismatic performances and has been a prominent figure in the entertainment industry for several decades. She has received numerous accolades, including Grammy Awards, Golden Globes, Tony Awards, and Emmy Awards, reflecting her widespread impact and success across various entertainment platforms.

Phoebe Cates.info: Phoebe Cates is an American actress and former model. She was born on July 16, 1963, in New York City, New York, USA. Cates gained fame in the 1980s with roles in films such as "Fast Times at Ridgemont High" (1982) and "Gremlins" (1984). As of the current year, 2023, Phoebe Cates is 60 years old. She is also known for stepping back from her acting career to focus on her family and other ventures, including co-owning a boutique in New York City called Blue Tree.

Macaulay Culkin.info: Macaulay Culkin is an American actor best known for his role as Kevin McCallister in the "Home Alone" film series. He was born on August 26, 1980, in New York City, New York, USA. As of 2023, Macaulay Culkin is 43 years old. His work in the early 1990s as a child star made him one of the most successful child actors of that time.

Ed O'Neill.info: Ed O'Neill is an American actor best known for his roles in popular television sitcoms. He was born on April 12, 1946, in Youngstown, Ohio, USA. As of now, he is 77 years old. O'Neill gained wide recognition and popularity for his portrayal of Al Bundy in the long-running television series "Married... with Children." He later starred as Jay Pritchett on the acclaimed modern sitcom "Modern Family," which further solidified his status as a beloved actor in the television industry. Throughout his career, O'Neill has been praised for his comedic timing and has become an iconic figure in American television.

James Belushi.info: James Belushi is an American actor, comedian, and musician, best known for his roles in various films and television shows. He was born on June 15, 1954, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. As of the current year, 2023, James Belushi is 69 years old. He gained popularity through his work on the television series "According to Jim," as well as his performances in movies like "K-9," "Red Heat," and "The Principal." In addition to acting, James is also known for his involvement in music, having performed with his band, The Sacred Hearts.

Mark Harmon.info: Mark Harmon is an American actor born on September 2, 1951, in Burbank, California, USA. He is best known for his role as Leroy Jethro Gibbs on the long-running television series "NCIS." As of October 2023, Mark Harmon is 72 years old. He has had a successful career in television and film, earning recognition for his performances and contributions to the entertainment industry. Harmon comes from a family with a background in sports and acting; his father, Tom Harmon, was a famous football player and sportscaster, and his mother, Elyse Knox, was a well-known actress and model.

Tom Hank.info: Tom Hanks, born Thomas Jeffrey Hanks, is an acclaimed American actor and filmmaker known for his versatility and charm. He was born on July 9, 1956, in Concord, California, USA. As of October 2023, Tom Hanks is 67 years old. He has had a prolific career in Hollywood, starring in a wide range of films from comedies to dramas, and is often praised for his performances in movies such as "Forrest Gump," "Saving Private Ryan," "Cast Away," and the "Toy Story" series. Hanks has won several awards throughout his career, including two consecutive Academy Awards for Best Actor for his roles in "Philadelphia" (1993) and "Forrest Gump" (1994).

John Hawkes.info: John Hawkes is an American actor known for his versatile and compelling performances in both film and television. He was born on September 11, 1959, in Alexandria, Minnesota, USA. As of 2023, John Hawkes is 64 years old. Throughout his career, he has taken on a wide range of roles, often portraying complex characters. Some of his notable works include roles in "Winter's Bone," "Deadwood," and "The Sessions," the latter of which earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor. His ability to immerse himself into diverse roles has earned him critical acclaim and a dedicated fan base.

Kent Williams.info: Kent Williams is an American actor and voice actor known for his work in anime and video games. Born on December 27, 1964, in Harlem, New York, Williams has become recognized for his diverse voice acting roles, particularly in English-language dubs of Japanese anime. As of 2023, he is 58 years old. Kent is particularly renowned for his roles in popular anime series such as "Fullmetal Alchemist," where he voiced the character Father, and "Dragon Ball Z," where he provided the voice for characters such as Dr. Gero and Supreme Kai. His extensive work in the industry has made him a well-known figure among anime enthusiasts.

Rip Torn.info:
Rip Torn was a renowned American actor known for his versatile performances in film, television, and theater. He was born Elmore Rual Torn Jr. on February 6, 1931, in Temple, Texas, USA. Rip Torn had a successful and varied career that spanned more than six decades, during which he played a wide range of characters and earned critical acclaim.

Throughout his career, he was perhaps best known for his roles in movies such as "Men in Black," "Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story," and "The Larry Sanders Show," for which he won an Emmy Award. He also received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor for his role in "Cross Creek."

Rip Torn passed away on July 9, 2019, at the age of 88, leaving behind a legacy of memorable performances and contributions to the entertainment industry.

Collin Firth.info: Colin Firth is a renowned British actor known for his versatility and compelling performances across various genres. He was born on September 10, 1960, in Grayshott, Hampshire, England. As of October 2023, Colin Firth is 63 years old. Over the years, he has earned numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in "The King’s Speech" (2010). Firth's distinguished career spans several decades, with notable performances in films such as "Pride and Prejudice" (1995), "Bridget Jones’s Diary" (2001), "A Single Man" (2009), and "Kingsman: The Secret Service" (2014).

Bubba Smith.info: Bubba Smith was born Charles Aaron Smith on February 28, 1945, in Orange, Texas, USA. He was an American actor and professional football player. After retiring from a successful NFL career, during which he played for the Baltimore Colts, Oakland Raiders, and Houston Oilers, Smith transitioned to acting. He became best known for his role as Moses Hightower in the "Police Academy" film series. Bubba Smith passed away on August 3, 2011, at the age of 66, in Los Angeles, California.

Bobcat Goldthwait.info:
Bobcat Goldthwait is an American actor, comedian, and filmmaker known for his unique voice and energetic delivery. He was born on May 26, 1962, in Syracuse, New York, USA. As of October 2023, Bobcat Goldthwait is 61 years old. 

In addition to his acting career, Goldthwait has cultivated a diverse career in stand-up comedy, television, and film directing. He gained significant popularity in the 1980s with his unconventional comedy style and performances in films like the "Police Academy" series, and he has since transitioned into directing both films and television episodes, often focusing on dark comedy and satirical themes.

Elizabeth McGovern.info: Elizabeth McGovern is an American actress and musician, born on July 18, 1961, in Evanston, Illinois, USA. As of October 2023, she is 62 years old. McGovern is known for her versatility in acting, having performed in various film, television, and theater productions. She gained significant recognition for her role as Cora Crawley, Countess of Grantham, in the acclaimed television series "Downton Abbey." Besides her acting career, Elizabeth McGovern is also involved in music, and she has performed with her band, Sadie and the Hotheads.
